intro.en: Recovers 100 health points.
intro.zh: 回復 100 生命值.

intro.en: A hunter's bow.
intro.zh: 一個獵人的弓.

intro.en: Recovers 100 mana.
intro.zh: 回復100點魔力值.

intro.en: Cures poison.
intro.zh: 解毒。

intro.en: Recovers 100 health points and 100 mana.
intro.zh: 回復 100 生命值及 100 魔力值。

intro.en: Recovers 250 health points.
intro.zh: 回復 250 生命值.

intro.en: Recovers 250 mana.
intro.zh: 回復250魔力值.

intro.en: Recovers 250 health points and 250 mana.
intro.zh: 回復250點生命及法力值.

intro.en: Recovers 500 health points.
intro.zh: 回復 500 生命值.

intro.en: Recovers 500 mana.
intro.zh: 回復500魔力值。

intro.en: Recovers 500 health points and 500 mana.
intro.zh: 回復 500 生命值及 500 魔力值。

intro.en: The universal remedy.
intro.zh: 亂世中的唯一救贖。

intro.en: A shiny, lucky coin. Boosts gold earned for a period of time.
intro.zh: 閃亮亮的幸運金幣.能在一定時間內提升獲得的金錢.

intro.en: A shiny, lucky, silver coin. Boosts orns earned for a period of time.
intro.zh: 閃亮亮的幸運銀幣，可以在一段時間內增加獲得的歐幣。

intro.en: A sour tasting elixir that doubles experience earned for a limited time.
intro.zh: 聞起來有點可怕的藥水，它能暫時性提高經驗值獲取量。

intro.en: A strange apparatus suitable for finding that which cannot be easily found. Boosts item and discovery rate for a period of time.
intro.zh: 常用於尋找隱藏物品的神奇的玩意兒。它能暫時性提高物品獲取率。

intro.en: Use it at night to increase visibility. You may attract more monsters as well.
intro.zh: 在夜晚使用它以增加視野，並可能引來更多魔物。

intro.en: A mysterious candle that draws more enemies to you for a limited time when lit.
intro.zh: 點燃此神秘的蠟燭將在期間內引來更多敵人。

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.
intro.zh: 可於戰鬥中提升物攻的酸藥劑。

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your defense in battle.
intro.zh: 可在戰鬥中提升物防的藥劑。

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your speed in battle.
intro.zh: 可在戰鬥中增加敏捷的酸化藥劑。

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.
intro.zh: 可以提升魔力的酸酸藥水.

intro.en: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used.
intro.zh: 被擊倒的魔物所殘留的芬芳遺骸，使用它會引來頭目。

intro.en: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used.
intro.zh: 被擊倒的魔物所殘留的芬芳遺骸，使用它會引來頭目。

intro.en: The nectar of gods.
intro.zh: 神之雫.

intro.en: A sword with a wide blade.
intro.zh: 寬大刀刃的劍.

intro.en: A wise mage's cane.
intro.zh: 智者法杖。

intro.en: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat.
intro.zh: 近身作戰時很好用的短刀.

intro.en: An old, rusty sword.
intro.zh: 老舊生鏽的劍.

intro.en: A trusty, yet short, sword.
intro.zh: 一把可靠的短劍。

intro.en: A mage's staff.
intro.zh: 法師之杖。

intro.en: A simple sword and shield.
intro.zh: 就是個劍和盾.

intro.en: A mage's staff crafted of enchanted wood.
intro.zh: 魔法木製成的法杖。

intro.en: A woodcutter's axe. Useful as a tool or as a weapon.
intro.zh: 伐木工的斧頭.當工具或武器都好用.

intro.en: An axe wielded by monsters of the night. Enhanced with dark magic.
intro.zh: 夜晚的野獸所持的大斧.有暗黑魔法附著.

intro.en: A large, crushing axe.
intro.zh: 巨大的破壞斧.

intro.en: A crude blade forged of the remains of a bear.
intro.zh: 利用熊的遺骸所製作的粗製刀刃。

intro.en: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with ice.
intro.zh: 適合用來近身作戰用的刀刃.特別附有冰之魔力.

intro.en: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with ice.
intro.zh: 施展魔法用的棒棒.這把尤其有冰之魔力.

intro.en: A large cross-hilted weapon that is seen as a sign of distinction. It may break an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 巨大的十字刀柄讓人一看就能認出它.有機會能降低對手的防禦.

intro.en: A hunter's crossbow.
intro.zh: 一把獵人之弩。

intro.en: A long thrusting dagger. Has a high chance to cause bleeding.
intro.zh: 長穿刺匕首，有高機率使敵人流血。

intro.en: An archistaff granted to Draconian lords. Illuminates your path while carried.
intro.zh: 被賞賜給德肯尼亞族領主的權杖.能照亮你眼前的道路.

intro.en: A bow of a Draconian forged by the Draconians.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族打造的德肯尼亞之弓。

intro.en: A staff of a Draconian acolyte. High magic power.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族追隨者的法杖.有頗高的魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族鐵匠鑄造之劍，品質令人讚嘆。

intro.en: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族法師之杖，擁有超凡的魔法攻擊力。

intro.en: A single edged sword with a curved blade, often used as a tool rather than in combat.
intro.zh: 彎曲的單刃刀,比起戰鬥更常作為工具使用.

intro.en: The trusty staff of a fallen mage.
intro.zh: 墮落法師的法杖.

intro.en: The trusty dagger of a fallen thief.
intro.zh: 墮落盜賊的可靠的匕首.

intro.en: The trusty sword of an unfortunately fallen warrior.
intro.zh: 不幸墮落的戰士之劍.

intro.en: A staff favored by archmages of older times.
intro.zh: 古代大法師愛用的法杖。

intro.en: An extremely heavy sword, that must be wielded with all your might.
intro.zh: 用盡全力才拿得起來的超重大劍.

intro.en: A large hammer suitable for crushing blows.
intro.zh: 適用於擊打的大錘子。

intro.en: A simple pair of kunai.
intro.zh: 就是一組苦無.

intro.en: A trusty longsword.
intro.zh: 一把可靠的長劍。

intro.en: A blunt weapon suitable for heavy blows.
intro.zh: 適合用來揮擊的鈍器.

intro.en: A large, crushing axe used by a minotaur.
intro.zh: 牛頭怪所使用的巨大雙面斧。

intro.en: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with fire.
intro.zh: 適合近身作戰的短刀.特別的是他上面有火焰的附魔.

intro.en: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with fire.
intro.zh: 用來釋放魔法的棍棒.這隻特別充滿了火焰.

intro.en: A short sword with a curved blade, designed for horseback combat.
intro.zh: 專為騎馬打仗設計的彎曲刀片短劍。

intro.en: A sword and shield pairing made of hardened steel.
intro.zh: 用淬硬鋼做的劍盾組.

intro.en: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.
intro.zh: 奇怪的遠古法杖.似乎能用來施法或是物理攻擊用.

intro.en: Although the Lizarr seemed untrained in advanced weaponry, these fine bows have been found within their settlements. This bow is enchanted with the power of ice and water.
intro.zh: 雖然蜥蜴人沒有受過先進的武器訓練，但在他們的居住地發現這些精美的弓箭，這把弓充滿了冰與水之力。

intro.en: A curved blade often used by nautical warriors.
intro.zh: 通常為航海戰士所使用的彎刀。

intro.en: Blade of the wandering demon knights. Its thick obsidian blade is infused with the power of darkness and may cause an opponent to fall asleep.
intro.zh: 流浪的惡魔騎士之劍，它厚厚的黑曜石刀片被注入黑暗之力，並有機率使敵人沉睡。

intro.en: The archistaff of a powerful fallen mage.
intro.zh: 強力的墮落法師之權杖.

intro.en: A large axe of a fallen knight.
intro.zh: 墮落騎士的大斧頭.

intro.en: The longbow of a fallen rogue.
intro.zh: 墮落俠盜的長弓.

intro.en: A large, undulating blade said to resemble that of flames.
intro.zh: 一把巨大、具有波形的長刀，看似火焰一般。

intro.en: A sword and shield pairing enchanted with the power of fire.
intro.zh: 附有火之力的劍盾組合.

intro.en: A pair of daggers enchanted with the power of the cold.
intro.zh: 附有寒冷魔力的一對匕首.

intro.en: Magical staff of a Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.
intro.zh: 神燈精靈的法杖.能造成無法預測的狀態異常.

intro.en: Crude blade of the Lizarr.
intro.zh: 蜥蜴人的粗刃。

intro.en: A deadly spiked ball on a chain.
intro.zh: 裝在鎖鏈上的致命鐵球.

intro.en: A sturdy bow forged with mythril.
intro.zh: 秘銀打造的結實大弓.

intro.en: A fine dagger forged of mythril.
intro.zh: 精巧的秘銀匕首.

intro.en: A large hammer made of mythril.
intro.zh: 秘銀製成的大錘。

intro.en: A fine sword forged of mythril.
intro.zh: 用秘銀打造的好劍.

intro.en: A large tool quite suitable for cutting grass.
intro.zh: 適合割草的大工具。

intro.en: A silver dagger. Quite suitable when fighting the undead.
intro.zh: 銀製匕首.適合拿來和不死者戰鬥.

intro.en: A silver crossbow especially effective against the undead.
intro.zh: 對不死者特別有效的銀質十字弓.

intro.en: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.
intro.zh: 狼人法師的杖.附有大地魔法.

intro.en: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 用大蝙蝠的遺骸打造的弓.能破壞對手的防禦.

intro.en: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.
intro.zh: 一把令人恐懼的斧頭，看似用不死生物的堅硬骨頭鍛造而成。它有很大的機會使對手暈眩。

intro.en: A staff that harnesses the dark power of the underworld.
intro.zh: 駕馭冥府暗黑魔力的法杖.

intro.en: A staff that harnesses the earthen power below the wielder.
intro.zh: 聚集大地之力的法杖.

intro.en: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.
intro.zh: 精靈戰士所有的極具裝飾性的武器。

intro.en: A bow used by Fomorian hunters.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族獵人使用的弓.

intro.en: A staff of a Fomorian mage.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族法師的法杖.

intro.en: A crude blade used by Fomorian rogues.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族俠盜使用的粗刃。

intro.en: A sword of a Fomorian warrior.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族戰士的劍.

intro.en: A seemingly ageless magical staff.
intro.zh: 貌似永恆的法杖。

intro.en: Blunt axe of an Orcish warrior.
intro.zh: 半獸人戰士的粗曠斧頭.

intro.en: Blunt blade of an Orcish warrior.
intro.zh: 巨魔戰士的粗曠大劍.

intro.en: A blade of the spellsword.
intro.zh: 魔劍士的劍.

intro.en: Two sharp daggers made of the finest of silver. Useful for hunting the undead.
intro.zh: 最好的銀製成的鋒利雙匕首，用來獵殺不死族很有用。

intro.en: A staff that harnesses the power lurking above the wielder.
intro.zh: 能駕馭雲上之力的法杖.

intro.en: A staff crafted with adamantine. Surely, it will never break.
intro.zh: 精金製成的法杖，當然，它永遠不會損壞。

intro.en: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.
intro.zh: 強大女巫的老舊黑暗法杖，可以稍微增加獲得的經驗值。

intro.en: A fiery red blade used by the Fomorians.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族使用的赤紅刀刃.

intro.en: A spear of a Stormforce warrior. Very few can wield this weapon without feeling a great shock.
intro.zh: 風暴戰士之矛，很少有人揮舞它不會受到震盪。

intro.en: A fine blade crafted of a Dragon's talon
intro.zh: 使用龍爪打造的良質刀刃

intro.en: A fine blade crafted of a Dragon's talon
intro.zh: 使用龍爪打造的良質刀刃

intro.en: A pike of a Earth Legionnaire.
intro.zh: 大地軍團兵的長矛.

intro.en: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.
intro.zh: 精靈戰士所有的極具裝飾性的武器。

intro.en: A highly decorative staff wielded by Elven mages.
intro.zh: 精靈法師使用的華麗法杖.

intro.en: A foggy, mysterious blade. It may blind an opponent.
intro.zh: 霧濛濛的神秘之刃。可能會使對手致盲。

intro.en: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. Increases your ability to see.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌水晶之眼的強力法杖，可以增加你的視野。

intro.en: A staff of the Frozenguard that is eternally frozen.
intro.zh: 永恆冰凍的寒霜守衛之杖.

intro.en: Magical staff of a great Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.
intro.zh: 上級神燈精靈的魔法杖.能造成無法預測的異常狀態.

intro.en: The followers of Ankou are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 追隨安庫的人都很可怕,這種大鐮刀更是他們欽點的武器.有高機率使對手流血.

intro.en: A sword and shield pairing fit for royal guards.
intro.zh: 適合皇家守衛的劍盾組合.

intro.en: This sword of the Inferno Knights is eternally ablaze.
intro.zh: 這把煉獄騎士的劍將永遠熾盛.

intro.en: A powerful weapon of rain and thunder. Contains the power of lightning and may paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 富含雷與暴雨之力的武器.能使對手麻痺.

intro.en: An evil blade wielded by experienced vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.
intro.zh: 老練的吸血鬼使用的妖刀.攻擊時能稍微回復生命值.

intro.en: Dagger often carried as a sidearm by demon soldiers. Has the chance of both burning and causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 惡魔士兵配戴的副手匕首，有機會使對手燃燒及流血。

intro.en: Silver bow of a legendary huntress. It grants its wielder extra dexterity.
intro.zh: 傳奇獵人的銀質長弓.能提升敏捷.

intro.en: A blade with the power to cleave the tops from the hills. It may paralyze an opponent, while protecting its wielder from paralyzation.
intro.zh: 開山刀，它可能會麻痺對手，並保護持有者免疫麻痺。

intro.en: A mythical dagger said to have the magical power to shroud its user in shadow. It may lull an opponent to sleep.
intro.zh: 傳說中能將使用者壟罩在陰影之中的魔法匕首，它可能會使對手沉睡。

intro.en: A legendary blade that blazes with fire when drawn.
intro.zh: 出鞘時會燃燒的傳說之刃。

intro.en: A sword brought by an angel of God. Some say it is the sharpest sword in existence, easily causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 神之使者帶來的劍，有人說這是世上最鋒利的劍，可以輕易使敵人流血。

intro.en: Staff of a fallen mystic.
intro.zh: 墮落秘術士的法杖.

intro.en: A beautiful blade that resemble stars in the night sky.
intro.zh: 就像那夜空繁星般的美麗刀刃。

intro.en: An axe and shield pairing suitable of taking down great beasts.
intro.zh: 斧頭和盾牌的配對，適合擊倒巨獸。

intro.en: Crude blades made from the talons of a wyvern. These blades can cause your opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 用飛龍尖爪做的粗糙刀刃.它能讓你的對手流血.

intro.en: An archistaff granted to Draconian lords. Illuminates your path while carried.
intro.zh: 被賞賜給德肯尼亞族領主的權杖.能照亮你眼前的道路.

intro.en: A large, crushing axe used by a minotaur
intro.zh: 牛頭怪所使用的巨大雙面斧

intro.en: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的強力大斧.

intro.en: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的高超大弓.

intro.en: A staff of the occult. Boasts strong magic power, but can also be used as a weapon. Additionally It heals its wielder when dealing damage.
intro.zh: 神秘之地的法杖.能提升魔力也能用來當物理武器.造成傷害時能治療持有者.

intro.en: Blade taken from Ankou's deadly scythe. Increases orns and experience earned.
intro.zh: 從安庫的死神鐮刀上取下的刀刃.能提升獲得的經驗和歐幣.

intro.en: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的優良法杖.

intro.en: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.
intro.zh: 曾經固定在高貴的雕像上的匕首.有小機率使對手石化.

intro.en: A simple hood.
intro.zh: 就是個兜帽.

intro.en: A leather hat.
intro.zh: 一頂皮革帽。

intro.en: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族俠盜風帽。

intro.en: A hood of a Draconian mage.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族法師兜帽。

intro.en: An old iron helmet.
intro.zh: 老舊的鐵頭盔.

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: A cowl made of great snake's remains.
intro.zh: 用大蛇遺骸製成的風帽.

intro.en: Hood of a count. It's quite stylish, really.
intro.zh: 伯爵的兜帽.相當的有型,真的啦.

intro.en: Blackened hood of an undead mage. Increases orns earned.
intro.zh: 不死法師的染黑兜帽.增加獲得的歐幣.

intro.en: Hood of a wolfman. Offers decent physical defense.
intro.zh: 狼人的兜帽.能提供可觀的物理防禦力.

intro.en: Silver armor that is quite protective.
intro.zh: 可提供防護的銀色裝甲。

intro.en: A seemingly ageless yet pristine hood.
intro.zh: 看起來很新的兜帽.

intro.en: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale
intro.zh: 覆蓋著龍鱗的厚重盔甲

intro.en: A hood worn by Fomorian mages
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族法師穿的兜帽

intro.en: A helmet smithed of adamantine. Surely, it will never break.
intro.zh: 精金製成的頭盔，當然，它不會損壞。

intro.en: Worn cowl of a dark elf.
intro.zh: 黑暗精靈的破舊風帽.

intro.en: Worn hood of a dark elf.
intro.zh: 黑暗精靈的破舊兜帽.

intro.en: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.
intro.zh: 被放逐的女巫卡門的象徵性頭飾.

intro.en: An exotic helmet made of wyvern skin.
intro.zh: 用飛龍皮做的高級頭盔.

intro.en: Armor made of chainmail.
intro.zh: 鎖鏈做的盔甲.

intro.en: A smelly old robe.
intro.zh: 臭臭的舊法袍.

intro.en: Light armor of a goblin.
intro.zh: 哥布林的輕裝甲。

intro.en: Light armor reinforced with hardened leather. Offers fair protection from the elements.
intro.zh: 由硬化皮革加工而成的輕裝甲，對於元素攻擊提供直接地保護。

intro.en: Heavy armor made of iron.
intro.zh: 鐵做的厚重盔甲.

intro.en: A simple leather jacket.
intro.zh: 就是個皮革外套.

intro.en: A simple mage's robe. Offers a small amount of magic protection.
intro.zh: 就是個法師的長袍.稍微有點魔法防禦力.

intro.en: Armor made of the hide of a bear.
intro.zh: 由熊身上所取得的盔甲。

intro.en: Armor of a Draconian warrior.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族戰士盔甲。

intro.en: Body coverings of a Draconian rogue.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族俠盜罩衫。

intro.en: A robe of a Draconian mage.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族法師長袍。

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: Armor made of great snake's remains.
intro.zh: 大蛇遺體製成的盔甲。

intro.en: Cloak of a count. It's quite stylish, really.

intro.en: A simple amulet. Slightly raises attack power.

intro.en: A standard belt. Improves your dexterity.
intro.zh: 很基本款的腰帶，稍微提高一點敏捷性。

intro.en: A standard ring. You feel slightly stronger while wearing it. Slightly raises defense.
intro.zh: 基本款的戒指.戴上它能稍微提升物防.

intro.en: An odd blue gem. Raises MP when equipped.
intro.zh: 奇怪的藍色寶石.裝備時能提升魔力值.

intro.en: An odd green gem. Raises magic power when equipped.

intro.en: A tome of common monsters. Slightly boosts experience earned.
intro.zh: 普通的魔物之典.能稍微提升獲得的經驗值.

intro.en: An odd red gem. Raises HP when equipped.
intro.zh: 奇怪的紅色寶石，裝備它會增加生命值。

intro.en: A shiny, silver amulet. Raises attack power.
intro.zh: 閃亮亮的銀質護身符.能提升物攻.

intro.en: A belt fashioned with steel. Improves your dexterity and defense.
intro.zh: 鋼製腰帶，可以增加你的敏捷和物防。

intro.en: A ring made of steel. Raises defense when worn.
intro.zh: 用鋼製成的戒指.戴上它能提升物防.

intro.en: An odd blue crystal. Boosts MP when equipped.
intro.zh: 一個奇怪的藍色水晶，裝備時可以增加魔力值。

intro.en: A bag for coins. Slightly raises gold earned.
intro.zh: 裝零錢的袋子.能稍微提升獲得的金錢.

intro.en: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.
intro.zh: 有著詭異魔法加持的奇怪眼球.拿在手上能稍微提升身體素質.

intro.en: An odd green crystal. Boosts magic power when equipped.
intro.zh: 奇特的綠水晶.裝備時能提升魔力.

intro.en: Keep this in your hand at night to increase visibility. You may attract more monsters as well.
intro.zh: 拿在手上能增加視野. 也能吸引更多的怪物.

intro.en: A rare amulet made of mythril. Raises attack power.
intro.zh: 秘銀製成的稀有護身符，可以提升物攻。

intro.en: A ring made of mythril. Raises defense when worn.
intro.zh: 秘銀製成的戒指，穿戴時可以增加物防。

intro.en: An odd red crystal. Boosts HP when equipped.
intro.zh: 一顆奇怪的紅色水晶，裝備它可以增加生命值。

intro.en: Belt of Earthen Legion. Grants protection from earthen magic.
intro.zh: 大地軍團的腰帶，保護穿戴者減免地屬性法術的傷害。

intro.en: A skull enchanted with strange magic. Attracts more monsters to you when carried.
intro.zh: 附有奇妙魔法的顱骨.戴上它能更多吸引怪物.

intro.en: Belt of the Inferno Knights. Grants protection from fire.
intro.zh: 煉獄騎士的腰帶.能抵禦烈火.

intro.en: Belt of the Frozenguard. Grants protection from ice.
intro.zh: 寒霜守衛的腰帶.能抵擋寒氣.

intro.en: A rare platinum amulet. Raises attack power.
intro.zh: 罕見的白金護身符.能提升物理攻擊力.

intro.en: Belt of Stormforce. Grants protection from lightning.
intro.zh: 風暴之力的腰帶.能抵抗雷電.

intro.en: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.
intro.zh: 巨魔的神奇護身符，可以增加許多屬性。

intro.en: A strange magical ring. Those who do not possess physical strength can equip this ring to sacrifice magic for attack power.
intro.zh: 適合弱雞的奇特魔戒，它會犧牲魔攻以換取物攻。

intro.en: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.
intro.zh: 充滿魔物知識的巨著.能增加獲得的經驗值.

intro.en: A gnome's red hat.

intro.en: An unbreakable chunk of adamantine. Used to craft extremely durable weapons and armor.

intro.en: An extremely ancient stone. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.
intro.zh: 非常古老的石頭，它可以用來升級強大的武器。

intro.en: A fragment of sturdy bone. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

intro.en: Stone mined from an eerie cave. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

intro.en: A rare piece of darkstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.
intro.zh: 一塊稀有的暗黑石，它可以用來製作與升級魔法武器或防具。

intro.en: Unrefined ore of the underworld. Useful for upgrading demonic weapons.

intro.zh: 一塊堅固的石頭，它可以用來製作與升級武器或防具。

intro.en: Bones of the undead can rarely be so strong.
intro.zh: 不死族的骨頭難得這麼強壯。

intro.zh: 似乎是黑夜領主珍藏的礦石，可以用來升級武器。

intro.zh: 偉大女巫製作的奇怪石頭.

intro.en: What a strange substance. What could it ever be for?
intro.zh: 真是奇怪的東西。是能用來幹嘛？

intro.en: A solid piece of wood. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.
intro.zh: 一塊堅硬的木頭，它可以用來製作與升級武器或防具。

intro.en: Boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.
intro.zh: 駕馭蒼穹的法師穿的靴子.能抵抗雷電.

intro.en: Boots of a mage who controlled the heat. Grants protection from fire.
intro.zh: 控制熱能的魔法長靴，能抵抗火屬性。

intro.en: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.
intro.zh: 附有深海之力的斧頭.

intro.en: An exotic hood made of wyvern skin.
intro.zh: 用飛龍皮做的高級兜帽.

intro.en: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 用大蝙蝠的遺骸打造的弓.能破壞對手的防禦.

intro.en: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.
intro.zh: 狼人法師的杖.附有大地魔法.

intro.en: Boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.
intro.zh: 控制大地能量的魔法長靴，能抵抗地屬性。

intro.en: Boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.
intro.zh: 可控制潮汐的法師穿戴的靴子，它可以保護穿戴者免受水與冰的侵害。

intro.en: A hunter's longbow.
intro.zh: 一個獵人的長弓.

intro.en: Silk of a great spider. Useful for upgrading rare weapons.
intro.zh: 大蜘蛛製造的絲，可以用來升級稀有武器。

intro.en: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.
intro.zh: 結實的絲線製成的堅固弩箭。

intro.en: A symbol of control over the force of chaos. It is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 控制混亂之力的象徵。非常適合裝飾。

intro.en: Bow of the underworld. It has a good chance of breaking an opponents defenses.
intro.zh: 來自地獄的弓，它有高機率突破敵人的防禦。

intro.zh: 附有冰之魔力的裝飾弓.能輕易使對手凍結.

intro.en: A mystical sword made of hardened wood.
intro.zh: 硬木製成的神秘之劍。

intro.en: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.
intro.zh: 奇怪的遠古法杖.似乎能用來施法或是物理攻擊用.

intro.en: A staff that brings down giants. It may break an opponents magical defenses.
intro.zh: 打倒巨人的法杖，它可以突破對手的魔防。

intro.en: A rare chunk of pure waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading powerful magical weapons or armor.
intro.zh: 一大塊稀有的純淨水石，它可以用來製作或升級強力的魔法武器或防具。

intro.en: A blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.
intro.zh: 附在長木柄尖端上的刀片。

intro.en: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.
intro.zh: 展現魔狼芬里爾之力的魔法劍.能暫時降低對手的物防.

intro.en: An axe blade atop a long pole. Useful for keeping distance while striking.
intro.zh: 有著長柄的斧頭。適用於保持距離作攻擊。

intro.en: A curved blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.
intro.zh: 用木頭裝飾的彎刀.

intro.en: A broad sword fit for a court's guard.
intro.zh: 適合宮廷守衛的闊劍。

intro.en: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.
intro.zh: 王室經常僱用流氓,以高品質的武器武裝他們.

intro.en: Armor fit for a court's guard.

intro.zh: 適合宮廷守衛的腿甲.

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

intro.zh: 有些法師對格鬥也略知一二.這頭盔就是他們用的.

intro.en: Boots of a Ljosalfar warrior.

intro.zh: 雖然蜥蜴人沒有受過先進的武器訓練，但在他們的居住地發現這些精美的弓箭，這把弓充滿了冰與水之力。

intro.zh: 強大的鬥士之魂.能用來升級稀有的武器和裝備.

intro.zh: 惡魔士兵配戴的副手匕首，有機會使對手燃燒及流血。

intro.en: The robe of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

intro.en: A pendant often worn by dragoons. It protects its wearer from blight.
intro.zh: 龍騎士都會有的吊飾.戴上它能防止被枯萎.

intro.en: A sturdy pendant often worn by centurions. It protects its wearer from being stunned.
intro.zh: 通常由百夫長穿戴的堅固吊飾，它可以讓穿戴者免疫眩暈。

intro.en: A magical pendant utilized by studious scholars. It prevents its wearer from falling asleep.
intro.zh: 學者所配戴的魔法吊飾.戴上它能防止被睡.

intro.zh: 獵人所使用的吊飾，它可以保護穿戴者免疫中毒。

intro.zh: 碩大的堅固泰坦原石.用來升級強力的裝備.

intro.zh: 巴羅爾俠盜使用的武士刀，有高機率使敵人流血。

intro.zh: 貝西摩斯的斧和盾.用他的蠻力攻擊有機會暫時使對手的防禦力降低.

intro.zh: 鼠王的腐爛長槍.能稍微提升獲得的經驗值及歐幣,並有機會造成中毒.

intro.zh: 常被用來對抗雞蛇的吊飾.戴上它能防止被石化.

intro.zh: 弗摩爾族戰士的劍.

intro.en: A helmet made of solid orichalcum.
intro.zh: 奧利哈鋼所製成的頭盔。

intro.en: Armor made of solid orichalcum.

intro.zh: 堅固的奧利哈鋼礦石.能用來強化堅固的裝備.

intro.en: A mystical staff of an elite Fomorian mage. Those who wield it cannot be burned, frozen, or paralyzed.
intro.zh: 菁英弗摩爾族法師所持有的神祕法杖，它可以讓持有者免疫燃燒、冰凍或麻痺。

intro.en: Ceremonial sword of a great woodland elf. It may poison an opponent.
intro.zh: 高等林地精靈的彎刀.有機會使對手中毒.

intro.en: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.
intro.zh: 曾經固定在高貴的雕像上的匕首.有小機率使對手石化.

intro.en: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.
intro.zh: 稀有的沙之彎刀。稍微增加賺取的金幣。

intro.en: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍堤豐的遺骸精心打造的強力大斧.

intro.en: A huge mace, favored by esteemed Dokkalfar warriors. Has a very high chance of stunning an opponent.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈戰士愛用的巨錘.有極高機率造成對手暈眩.

intro.en: Katana of elite Fomorian rogues. It has a good chance of causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族精銳盜賊的武士刀.有高機率使對手流血.

intro.en: A sturdy sword of an elite Fomorian warrior. One who wields it cannot have their attack power compromised.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族精銳戰士的劍.使用它的人攻擊力不會受到減損.

intro.en: A ceremonial sword of enlightened royalty. It can protect one from having their stats lowered and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 啟蒙者皇家儀式所使用的劍，它可以避免持有者屬性下降，並且適合鑲嵌。

intro.en: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 利用古龍堤豐的遺骸所精心製作的弓。

intro.en: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍堤豐的遺體打造的高級法杖.

intro.en: A magical crystalline staff carried by the most enlightened travelers. It is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 歷經風霜的冒險者們都想來一把水晶棒，它的美是如此的無與倫比。

intro.en: Armor of a Draconian warrior.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族戰士盔甲。

intro.en: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.
intro.zh: 精銳巴羅爾暴徒的暗黑盔甲.

intro.en: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.
intro.zh: 精銳巴羅爾暴徒的暗黑盔甲.

intro.en: Old, decrepit, dark archistaff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.
intro.zh: 強大女巫又老又破的暗黑權杖。略微提升了獲得的經驗。

intro.en: Boots of a Draconian rogue.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族俠盜長靴。

intro.en: Crimson robe of Dalan, the exalted High Elf.
intro.zh: 高等精靈達藍的緋紅法袍.

intro.en: Ivory robe of Horus, the winged protector of the skies. What it lacks in defensive power is made up with dexterity.
intro.zh: 有翼的天空守護者，荷魯斯的象牙法袍。它缺少的防禦能力透過敏捷補足。

intro.en: A bag for coins, carried by Hermes the merchant. Slightly raises gold earned.
intro.zh: 商人愛馬仕的零錢包.能稍微提升獲得的金錢.

intro.en: A bitter green elixir that heals poison, bleeding, blight, frozen, burning, paralysis, sleep, blindness, or rot.
intro.zh: 微苦的萬靈藥，能治癒中毒、流血、枯萎、凍結、燃燒、麻痺、入眠、致盲、腐爛。

intro.en: One can use this key to enter a Gauntlet.
intro.zh: 使用此鑰匙進入地城.

intro.en: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time.
intro.zh: 點燃此神秘的蠟燭將在一段時間內引來更強的敵人。

intro.en: Recovers 2500 health points and 1000 mana.
intro.zh: 回復 2500 生命值及 1000 魔力值。

intro.en: Recovers 2500 health points.
intro.zh: 回復 2500 生命值.

intro.en: Recovers 2500 mana.
intro.zh: 回復2500魔力值。

intro.en: A thin, pale blade granted to elite Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 被授予給巴羅爾戰士的輕薄長劍.

intro.en: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold earned.
intro.zh: 有趣的宮廷小丑服，可以增加獲得的金幣。

intro.en: A mushroom of unknown origin. Eating it will cause one to enrage.
intro.zh: 來路不明的磨菇.吃下它會讓人震怒.

intro.en: The trusty cane of Ra, the seer. Ra was obsessed with the senses of humans after losing much of his own. This staff increases your ability to see, while potentially blinding your opponent.
intro.zh: 先知—拉的可靠手杖，失去知覺後，拉痴迷於研究人類的知覺，這支法杖可以增強你的視力，並有機會致盲敵人。

intro.en: Arcane wand of Annwn court wizards. Arcane magic was found to be particularly effective against the forces of Balor.
intro.zh: 安溫皇室巫師的奧樹棒棒.他們發現奧術對巴羅爾的軍隊特別有效.

intro.en: Thin sword forged of Basilisk remains. It has a chance to cause either poison or blight.
intro.zh: 用巴西利斯克遺骸打造的劍。有機會使對手陷入中毒或枯萎.

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your magic defense in battle.
intro.zh: 於戰鬥中提升魔防的酸藥劑。

intro.en: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.
intro.zh: 一把令人恐懼的斧頭，看似用不死生物的堅硬骨頭鍛造而成。它有很大的機會使對手暈眩。

intro.en: Heavy hood made of strong hide. Offers mild protection against the elements.
intro.zh: 堅韌皮革製成的重型兜帽，保護穿戴者減免元素傷害。

intro.en: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.
intro.zh: 白騎士以斯拉的冷冽長劍.以斯拉建立了寒霜守衛來對抗德肯尼亞族的入侵.

intro.en: Chilling staff of Boreal, a Frozenguard elite. It has a high chance of freezing an opponent.
intro.zh: 寒霜守衛的菁英，波蕾爾的寒冰法杖，有高機率可以冰凍對手。

intro.en: A ring of certain evil. Wearing it attracts stronger monsters to you, but reduces your overall power.
intro.zh: 毫無疑問是個邪惡的戒指。佩戴它會吸引更強大的怪物，但會降低你的整體能力。

intro.en: A unique curved blade, specifically designed for escaping an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 一把獨特的彎刀，特別設計來繞過對手的防禦。

intro.en: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's left hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's magic power when attacking.
intro.zh: 巴林爵士拿在左手的厚重大劍.他的衝擊能降低對手的魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把彎刀正是其中之一.

intro.en: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 索爾持有的小槌子.索爾建立了風暴之力不久後便屈服於墮落之力之下.他的槌子能輕易的麻痺對手.

intro.en: The mythic weapon of Arthus, the king of Avalon. It protects its wielder from bleeding.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國亞瑟王的神兵，它可以保護持有者免疫流血。

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their physical or magical prowess lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止物理或魔法攻擊被降低.

intro.en: Chestplate forged of the remains of a mighty Cockatrice. It grants its wearer immunity from petrification.
intro.zh: 雞蛇遺體製成的胸甲.穿上它能防止被石化.

intro.en: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.
intro.zh: 精英巴羅爾法師的蒼白衣服。

intro.en: Boots worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆刺客穿戴的長靴，謠傳亞瑟王有一些神秘的癖好.

intro.en: The great blacksmith Creidhne created this alloy to forge the most powerful of weapons.
intro.zh: 由傳說中的鐵匠克雷迪內製造出來的材料,能打造最強力的武器.

intro.en: A pale blade often used by the most elite of Balor knights.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾精銳騎士使用的淡白刀刃.

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their defense lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止物理防禦被降低.

intro.en: A massive dwarven hammer, carried by Dudley the steadfast.
intro.zh: 穩重如山的達利所持的大槌.

intro.en: Formal attire of a King.
intro.zh: 國王的正式服裝。

intro.en: A hooked blade used by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆刺客使用的鉤形刀，謠傳亞瑟王有一些神秘的癖好.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.
intro.zh: 派磊的長矛永遠點燃著，它有高機率使敵人燃燒。

intro.en: A simple yet sentimental dagger of the aloof one, Carl.
intro.zh: 辣個男人-卡爾的簡單卻有故事的匕首。

intro.en: The hat of Aldon, the eccentric. Aldon's balance has never faltered, and one cannot be stunned while wearing this hat.
intro.zh: 怪人阿爾登的帽子.他平衡感極佳,戴上這帽子將不會暈眩.

intro.en: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士的淡白盔甲。

intro.en: Amulet of Draconian lords. It slightly extends one's health and mana.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族領主的護身符，少量增加持有者的生命值與魔力值。

intro.en: The crippling weapon of Knight Artifice, the dragonslayer of Avalon. It can lower an opponent's magical potential.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆的屠龍者-騎士阿提菲斯的武器.可以降低對手的魔法能力.

intro.en: The staff of the aspiring sorceress, Beatrice. It slightly boosts its wielder's mana.
intro.zh: 有抱負的法師碧翠絲的法杖。它會稍微提高持有者的法力值。

intro.en: Earthen polearm of Boulder, the Earthen Legion elite. It has a high chance of stunning an opponent.
intro.zh: 大地軍團的菁英博爾德拿的地之長槍.有高機率使對手暈眩.

intro.en: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.
intro.zh: 辣個男人-卡爾的戒指，可以稍微增加一些狀態。

intro.en: Spear of Gale, the Stormforce elite. It has a high chance of paralyzing an opponent.
intro.zh: 風暴軍團的精英凱爾的矛.有高機率使對手麻痺.

intro.en: Staff o' the Gnome Master, Nolan. 'Ave one 'ver seen such a wonder?
intro.zh: 侏儒大師諾蘭的法杖.有人看過拿~麼讚的東西嗎?

intro.en: Ivory hood of Sala, the High Elf.
intro.zh: 高等精靈莎拉的象牙兜帽。

intro.en: Lucky ring worn by bandits. Increases gold earned.
intro.zh: 土匪的幸運戒指，可以增加獲得的金幣。

intro.en: The bow of a long forgotten hero. It is now carried by Rouge, the crimson archer. Surely, one cannot miss a shot with this bow.
intro.zh: 被人們遺忘的英雄的弓.現在為緋紅弓手-嫣紅所有.拿著它,你將箭無虛發.

intro.en: Staff of a fallen druid. It greatly increases mana.
intro.zh: 墮落德魯伊持有的法杖，可大幅增加魔力值。

intro.en: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族鐵匠鑄造之劍，品質令人讚嘆。

intro.en: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族法師之杖，擁有超凡的魔法攻擊力。

intro.en: Ivory hood of Dalan, the exalted High Elf.
intro.zh: 高等精靈達藍的象牙兜帽。

intro.en: A strange crimson eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.
intro.zh: 充滿神秘魔法的緋紅眼球。將其掌握在手中會稍微提高所有素質。

intro.en: Staff of a lost dungeon explorer. It seems to have developed quite some power while resting deep within the land.
intro.zh: 迷失的地城探險者所持有的法杖，長眠在地底時，它似乎已發展出相當強大的力量。

intro.en: A pale staff granted to skilled Balor mages.
intro.zh: 熟練的巴羅爾法師使用的蒼白法杖。

intro.en: Heavy cloak of a bandit. Offers mild defense against the elements.
intro.zh: 土匪的厚重披風.對元素魔力有一點抗性.

intro.en: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.
intro.zh: 精銳巴羅爾暴徒的暗黑盔甲.

intro.en: A hard obsidian stone that resembles an empty night sky.
intro.zh: 類似於夜空的硬質黑曜石.

intro.en: A mighty alloy. It was used to craft Avalonian weapons and armor.
intro.zh: 非凡的合金，可以用來製作阿瓦隆的武器及盔甲。

intro.en: Heavy armor of Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Cloak worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆刺客所穿戴的披風.謠傳亞瑟王有一些神秘的癖好.

intro.en: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士的淡白盔甲。

intro.en: Heavy armor of Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Formal attire of a King.
intro.zh: 國王的正式服裝。

intro.en: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.
intro.zh: 精英巴羅爾法師的蒼白衣服。

intro.en: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士的淡白盔甲。

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把西洋劍正是其中之一.

intro.en: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.
intro.zh: 精英巴羅爾法師的蒼白衣服。

intro.en: Crimson robe of Sala, the High Elf.
intro.zh: 高等精靈莎拉的赤紅長袍。

intro.en: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's right hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's attack power.
intro.zh: 巴林爵士拿在右手的厚重大劍.他的衝擊能降低對手的物理攻擊力.

intro.en: Headpiece worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆刺客配戴的頭巾。謠傳亞瑟王有一些神秘的癖好。

intro.en: An evil blade wielded by Racul, King of vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.
intro.zh: 吸血鬼之王路卡爾的邪惡刀刃.用它攻擊能稍微回復生命值.

intro.en: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an odok undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.
intro.zh: 令人懼怕的斧頭，它是用亡骸的身軀所製成。攻擊有極大的機會造成暈眩效果。

intro.en: Formal attire of a King.
intro.zh: 國王的正式服裝。

intro.en: Bow of Dracon, the old Draconian king.
intro.zh: 古老德肯尼亞王者之弓。

intro.en: Sword of Dracon, the old Draconian king.
intro.zh: 古老的德肯尼亞王者之劍。

intro.en: Great staff of Avalon court mages.
intro.zh: 尊貴的阿瓦隆法師的法杖.

intro.en: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.
intro.zh: 古老元素神所穿戴的戒指，可以增加獲得的金幣、歐幣及經驗值。

intro.en: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Dark Elven lords.
intro.zh: 高度裝飾的暗精靈領主的武器.

intro.en: Magical staff of a Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.
intro.zh: 神燈精靈的法杖.能造成無法預測的狀態異常.

intro.en: Sparring sword of Gwyn, the former King of Annwn. This weapon can temporarily weaken opponents with ease.
intro.zh: 前安溫國王葛溫的陪練劍，此武器可以暫時削弱對手。

intro.en: Light armor of a Dokkalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈戰士的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Hood of a Dokkalfar mage.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈法師的兜帽.

intro.en: Helmet of a Dokkalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈戰士的頭盔.

intro.en: Great staff of a Dokkalfar mage.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈法師強大的法杖.

intro.en: A simple dagger, encrusted in a thick poison.
intro.zh: 塗滿毒藥的簡單匕首。

intro.en: An ebony blade of a Dokkalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈戰士的漆黑刀刃.

intro.en: Chestplate of a Dokkalfar knight.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈騎士的護胸.

intro.en: Robe of a Dokkalfar mage.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈法師的法袍.

intro.en: Boots of a Dokkalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈戰士的長靴.

intro.en: Cowl of a Dokkalfar rogue.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈俠盜的風帽.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把武士刀正是他的最愛,能輕易弱化對手.

intro.en: Recovers 5000 health points and 5000 mana.
intro.zh: 恢復 5000 生命值與 5000 魔力值。

intro.en: Prickly blade of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.
intro.zh: 林中物種的帶刺刀刃.有小機率使對手中毒.

intro.en: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.
intro.zh: 赤騎瓦肯很少帶上的無暇長劍.瓦肯建立了煉獄騎士來對抗安溫的軍勢.他的劍能輕易使對手燃燒.

intro.en: Prickly blades of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.
intro.zh: 林地物種的帶刺刀刃.有小機率使對手中毒.

intro.en: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.
intro.zh: 由溺死旅人的屍體變造而成的可怕法杖，可能會使墮落的野獸掉落更多的物品。

intro.en: An exotic hood made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的兜帽.

intro.en: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的胸甲.

intro.en: An exotic cowl made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的兜帽.

intro.en: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的胸甲.

intro.en: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的長靴.

intro.en: An exotic helmet made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的頭盔.

intro.en: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的長靴.

intro.en: An exotic robe made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的法袍.

intro.en: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of guivre skin.
intro.zh: 用蛇龍皮做成的厚重腿甲.

intro.en: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos.
intro.zh: 代表無情刻耳柏洛斯的強力之劍。

intro.en: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.
intro.zh: 用刻耳柏洛斯遺骸打造的耐用兜帽.穿上它能防止被冰凍.

intro.en: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的法杖.

intro.en: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.
intro.zh: 由刻耳柏洛斯那尖銳、強大、鋒利如刃的爪所製成。攻擊有機會造成流血及冰凍狀態。

intro.en: The contorted staff of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.
intro.zh: 狄蜜特的扭曲法杖.在墮落之後,狄蜜特創造了大地軍團來維持世界的平衡.不幸的是,在不久之後便迎來他們的命運.

intro.en: A crude axe of an ogre.
intro.zh: 食人魔的粗糙斧頭。

intro.en: Staff of Dracon, the old Draconian king.
intro.zh: 古老德肯尼亞王者之杖。

intro.en: A simple sword wielded by kobold warriors.
intro.zh: 地精戰士所持的劍.

intro.en: A simple staff wielded by kobold mages.
intro.zh: 地精法師持有的簡易法杖.

intro.en: Light armor of a kobold.
intro.zh: 地精的輕裝甲.

intro.en: A simple cloak worn by kobold mages.
intro.zh: 地精法師穿戴的簡易披風。

intro.en: A simple hood worn by kobold mages.
intro.zh: 地精法師穿的簡易兜帽.

intro.en: Boots of a kobold.
intro.zh: 地精的長靴.

intro.en: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.
intro.zh: 小妖精穿戴的奧術戒指，它可以增加魔力值及敏捷。

intro.en: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.
intro.zh: 被遺忘的惡作劇小妖的儀式刀。有高機率使對手中毒。

intro.en: Headwear of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It protects its wearer from both poison and toxicity.
intro.zh: 淘氣妖精—納根因的頭飾，它可以保護穿戴者免疫中毒與劇毒。

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.
intro.zh: 有些法師也很擅長格鬥.這是他們的靴子.

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.
intro.zh: 有些法師對格鬥也略知一二.這頭盔就是他們用的.

intro.en: Recovers 5000 health points.
intro.zh: 回復 5000 生命值.

intro.en: Recovers 5000 mana.
intro.zh: 回復5000魔力值。

intro.en: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的附魔腰帶.能防止被燃燒並提升生命值.

intro.en: The powerful, fiery staff of Cerus, the untamed bull.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的強力法杖.

intro.en: Helmet of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的頭盔. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的兜帽. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: The powerful, fiery axe of Cerus, the untamed bull. It has a good chance of stunning or burning an opponent.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的勇猛斧頭.有高機率暈眩或燃燒對手.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把大劍正是其中之一.

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.
intro.zh: 有些魔法師也擅長格鬥.這就是他們的盔甲.

intro.en: An ancient and decrepit blade carried by Mammon, the demon of hubris. It is of unknown use and is too worn to be used as any form of weapon.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門持有的老舊刀刃.實在太破爛以至於不知道該怎麼當作武器使用.

intro.en: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的俠盜所穿的長靴.

intro.en: Cowl worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的俠盜所戴的風帽.

intro.en: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的追隨者所穿的鞋子.

intro.en: Leggings worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的騎士所穿的腿甲.

intro.en: Robe worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔瑪門的追隨者所穿的法袍.

intro.en: Heavy armor worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 所屬於傲慢的惡魔瑪門的騎士所穿的重裝甲.

intro.en: Light armor worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 所屬於傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的俠盜所穿的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Hood worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的追隨者所穿的兜帽.

intro.en: Helmet worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 所屬於傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的騎士所戴的頭盔.

intro.en: A strange dark and warm ore refined by Balor mystics. It is useful in upgrading equipment of the exiled.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾秘術士精練的黑暗且溫暖的礦石，它可以用來升級流放者的裝備。

intro.en: Mystical robe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的神秘法袍.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫的輕裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫的輕裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Heavy axe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的巨斧.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Mystical hood crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的神秘兜帽.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的重裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Mystical boots crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的神秘長靴.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Heavy archistaff crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的厚重權杖.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的重裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Dark katana crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的暗黑武士刀.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫所製的重裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.
intro.zh: 被流放的毀滅祕法師亞坡倫的輕裝甲.亞坡倫曾試圖摧毀土地以阻止墮落,之後便因其非正統的方法而被流放.

intro.en: A pair of dark kunai, forged of a basilisk's claws.
intro.zh: 用巴西利斯克的利爪打造的暗黑苦無.

intro.en: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.
intro.zh: 讓人想起可怕雪人的大衣，它可以保護穿戴者免受冰凍及防禦力下降。

intro.en: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon to level 2.
intro.zh: 石英磨刀石，使用它可以輕鬆地將武器提升到等級2。

intro.en: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon from level 2 to 3.
intro.zh: 石英磨刀石，使用它可以輕鬆地將武器從2級升到3級。

intro.en: A seemingly ageless yet pristine hood.
intro.zh: 看起來很新的兜帽.

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: A seemingly ageless yet pristine robe.
intro.zh: 看起來嶄新的法袍.

intro.en: Great boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.
intro.zh: 操控大地之力法師的長靴.能抵抗大地魔法.

intro.en: Great boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.
intro.zh: 控制潮汐的大魔法師的長靴.能抵抗水及冰屬性.

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: A seemingly ageless yet pristine pair of boots.
intro.zh: 看起來嶄新的靴子.

intro.en: A Greatbow of Annwn, capable of loosing arcane arrows. It can cause a variety of status effects.
intro.zh: 安溫的長弓，可以射出奧術箭矢並造成各種異常狀態。

intro.en: A simple straight sword, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.
intro.zh: 簡單的筆直長劍.能高機率抓住對手防禦的空檔.

intro.en: A pair of unnecessarily sharp daggers. These will easily cause an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 鋒利到不像話的匕首.能輕易使對手流血.

intro.en: A sword carried by a talented gladiator. Through its might, an opponent's stats can be lowered.
intro.zh: 天賦極佳的角鬥士使用的劍.用它能使對手的身體能力降低.

intro.en: A shotel carried by a cunning gladiator. Shotels can easily pierce through an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 狡猾角鬥士使用的短刀，可以輕鬆突破對手的防禦。

intro.en: A large unrefined blade of giant warriors.
intro.zh: 巨人戰士的粗糙大劍。

intro.en: An archistaff of Avalon that is capable of lowering an opponent's resistance.
intro.zh: 可以降低敵人魔防的阿瓦隆權杖。

intro.en: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to story quest monster locations.
intro.zh: 注入魔法的石頭，使用它可以指引任務怪所在的方位。

intro.en: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to inn quest monster locations.
intro.zh: 一塊充滿魔法的石頭。用它來設置指南針標記以搜尋旅館任務怪物位置。

intro.en: A stone that can evoke memories of any location. Using it will place a temporary marker to your current location on your compass.
intro.zh: 能讓你記憶任何地點的石頭.使用後會放下一個暫時的路標來指向你目前的地點.

intro.en: A superb bow forged of the remains of a lost dragon. It has a good chance of causing blight.
intro.zh: 使用失落巨龍遺骸打造的高超大弓.有高機率造成對手枯萎.

intro.en: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.
intro.zh: 讓人想起可怕雪人的大衣，它可以保護穿戴者免受冰凍及防禦力下降。

intro.en: A fine blade crafted of a great dragon's talon
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍的爪打造的良質刀刃

intro.en: Azure staff of Castor, the Dioscuri magician. Castor and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.
intro.zh: 魔法師卡斯托耳的法杖.卡斯托耳和其雙子弟弟除非閒到不行才會離開那深海.

intro.en: Azure greatbow of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.
intro.zh: 狂戰士波魯克斯的蔚藍大弓.波魯克斯和其雙子兄長除非閒到不行才會離開那深海.

intro.en: Large, precise bow often carried by rangers of the wood.
intro.zh: 林間遊俠常使用的大弓.

intro.en: Great boots of a mage who controlled the heat. Grants protection from fire.
intro.zh: 控制熱能的大魔法師的長靴.能抵抗火屬性。

intro.en: Great boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.
intro.zh: 駕馭蒼穹的法師穿的靴子.能抵抗雷電.

intro.en: A blade of the spellsword.
intro.zh: 魔劍士的劍.

intro.en: For some reason, the Dioscuri love this terrible drink for its taste and not benefit. Consuming it will temporarily increase your critical hit rate.
intro.zh: 因為某些原因,狄奧斯庫洛伊兄弟很愛這種獵奇飲料的味道.使用它能短暫提升暴擊機率.

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.
intro.zh: 狂戰士波魯克斯的大斧.波魯克斯和其雙子兄長除非閒到不行才會離開那深海.

intro.en: An adorned sword forged of the most blessed of materials. It's great light can illuminate your path while blinding your opponents.
intro.zh: 用最被祝福的材料鍛造的裝飾劍。強大的光線可以照亮你的道路，同時使對手盲目。

intro.en: A simple rapier, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.
intro.zh: 適合用來突刺的精簡刺劍.有高機率讓對手解除防衛.

intro.en: A strange twilight eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will grant you more visibility at night while boosting HP and mana.
intro.zh: 被灌入神奇魔法的暮光之眼，拿在手上可以增加你的視野並增加生命值與魔力值。

intro.en: Lost, durable helmet of a now monstrous fallen warrior. Wearing it increases the amount of orns earned.
intro.zh: 已淪為魔物的墮落勇士的頭盔.戴上它能提升獲得的歐幣.

intro.en: An instrument often used to sooth dragons. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily boost one's magical prowess.
intro.zh: 常用來安撫龍的樂器.它的音色有時候能提升使用者的魔力.

intro.en: A simple bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's attack or magic.
intro.zh: 詩人用的簡易魯特琴，於戰鬥中彈奏可以暫時增加物攻或魔攻。

intro.en: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's defenses.
intro.zh: 詩人的魯特琴,有機會能暫時提升物理防禦.

intro.en: A strange magical ring of the Dioscuri. Those who do not possess physical strength can equip this ring to sacrifice magic for attack power.
intro.zh: 狄奧斯庫洛伊兄弟的奇妙魔力戒指.不太擅長物理的人能戴上它用魔力換取物理攻擊力.

intro.en: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of dragons. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily give useful statuses.
intro.zh: 常用來安撫至高無上巨龍的樂器.它所演奏出的樂曲有極少的機率能短暫賦予有用的狀態影響.

intro.en: An instrument of a long fallen Odok warrior. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily boost one's critical hit rate.
intro.zh: 來自亡骸戰士的樂器。有機會暫時提升暴擊率。

name.zh: 狄奧斯庫洛伊魔法戒指

intro.en: A strange magical ring of the Dioscuri. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.
intro.zh: 狄奧斯庫洛伊兄弟的詭異魔法戒指.不擅長魔法的人能戴上它用物理能力換取魔力.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren berserkers.
intro.zh: 北族狂戰士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren berserkers.
intro.zh: 北族狂戰士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren berserkers.
intro.zh: 北族狂戰士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Light armor of Nothren raiders.
intro.zh: 北族強襲者的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Light armor of Nothren raiders.
intro.zh: 北族強襲者的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Light armor of Nothren raiders.
intro.zh: 北族強襲者的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Magical attire of Nothren warlocks.
intro.zh: 北族術士的魔法裝。

intro.en: Magical attire of Nothren warlocks.
intro.zh: 北族術士的魔法裝。

intro.en: Famed golden flute of an Avalon bard. Playing its songs can temporarily raise one's magical defense.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆詩人所持有的著名金色長笛，演奏時可以暫時增加魔防。

intro.en: Magical attire of Nothren warlocks.
intro.zh: 北族術士的魔法裝。

intro.en: A chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren.
intro.zh: 北族強襲者最愛的巴德爾光石.

intro.en: A relic of Apollyon's less destructive years.
intro.zh: 亞坡倫還沒開始搞破壞時的遺物。

intro.en: A simple shield made of hardened wood.
intro.zh: 用堅固木頭打造的盾.

intro.en: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士的裝飾盾.

intro.en: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.
intro.zh: 能提升魔防的秘術盾牌.

intro.en: A shield portraying the emblem of a great duke.
intro.zh: 刻有大公國徽記的盾牌。

intro.en: A heavy shield carried by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris. It grants one immunity to being Cursed.
intro.zh: 所屬於傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的騎士所持的厚重盾牌.能免疫於被詛咒.

intro.en: The shield of a mighty templar knight. It provides extra physical defense.
intro.zh: 強大的聖殿騎士之盾。它提供了額外的物理防禦。

intro.en: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.
intro.zh: 能提升魔防的秘術盾牌.

intro.en: A gigantic shield that offers extra physical and magic defense at the expense of attack and magic.
intro.zh: 犧牲攻擊力以換取額外防禦力的巨大盾牌。

intro.en: A small dagger, carried in your off-hand. It slightly increases attack at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 配戴於副手的小匕首，它會犧牲護盾並稍微增加物攻。

intro.en: A shield crested the image of a Dragon. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.
intro.zh: 刻有龍的紋章的盾.能提升護盾並抵抗龍系攻擊.

intro.en: Shield carried by berserkers of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.
intro.zh: 北族領地的狂戰士使用的盾.能夠禦寒.

intro.en: A sharp trusty dagger, carried in your off-hand. It gives your attacks the chance to cause an opponent to bleed, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 副手用的鋒利匕首.以護盾為代價,有機會造成對手流血.

intro.en: An easily recognizable shield depicting the crest of Avalon.
intro.zh: 容易辨識的盾牌，上面印有阿瓦隆的紋章。

intro.en: A simple buckler.
intro.zh: 就是個小盾.

intro.en: A shield made of hardened monster bone.
intro.zh: 用堅固的魔物之骨做的盾.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are immensely heavy. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the greater chance to stun an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋極為沉重的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手眩暈的機會.

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止敏捷,物理或魔法攻擊被降低.

intro.en: A greatsword often used in defensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical defenses.
intro.zh: 全能的騎士巴林用來施展防衛劍術的大劍.他的斬擊能降低對手的物理或魔法防禦力.

intro.en: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.
intro.zh: 全能的騎士巴林用來施展攻擊劍術的大劍.他的斬擊能降低對手的物理或魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: The easily recognizable pole-arm of Cade, the great Avalonian inventor. Its hidden features can cause a variety of status effects.
intro.zh: 偉大的阿瓦隆發明家卡德廣為人知的長武器.能造成多種異常狀態.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: A shield made of hardened monster bone.
intro.zh: 用堅固的魔物之骨做的盾.

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止物理或魔法防禦被降低.

intro.en: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporary boost one's stats.
intro.zh: 天才詩人持有的魯特琴，於戰鬥中演奏可以暫時提昇持有者的狀態。

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren valkyries.
intro.zh: 北族女武神的重鎧甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren valkyries.
intro.zh: 北族女武神的重鎧甲.

intro.en: Shield carried by valkyries of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.
intro.zh: 北方大地的女武神使用的盾.能抵抗寒冷.

intro.en: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.
intro.zh: 由最有天賦的北族女武神持有的稀有劍刃。它可能會給予古娜態勢，提高攻擊力但降低防禦力。

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren valkyries.
intro.zh: 北族女武神的重鎧甲.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are coated in a thick poison. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to poison an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋塗抹劇毒的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手中毒的機會.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are easily lit aflame. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to burn an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋容易被點燃的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手燃燒的機會.

intro.en: A shield depicting the emblem of Draconia. It's not very well constructed.
intro.zh: 繪有德肯尼亞徽章的盾牌。做工不太好。

intro.en: A shield depicting the emblem of Fomoria.
intro.zh: 刻有弗摩爾族印記的盾牌。

intro.en: Crude staff of a Frilled Naga mage.
intro.zh: 褶傘那伽法師的殘暴法杖.

intro.en: Crude weapon of a Frilled Naga warrior.
intro.zh: 褶傘那伽戰士的殘暴武器.

intro.en: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.
intro.zh: 白騎士以斯拉的冷冽法杖.以斯拉建立了寒霜守衛來對抗德肯尼亞族的入侵.

intro.en: The contorted pole-arm of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.
intro.zh: 狄蜜特的棒棒.在墮落之後,狄蜜特創造了大地軍團來維持世界的平衡.不幸的是,在不久之後便迎來他們的命運.

intro.en: A deadly polearm carried by the fallen Heimdall, a lord of the Nothren.
intro.zh: 墮落的北族領主海姆達爾持有的兇殘棒棒.

intro.en: A perfect chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren. It is useful for upgrading powerful equipment.
intro.zh: 北族強襲者最愛的完美巴德爾光石.能用來升級強力的裝備.

intro.en: Shield carried by the great Heimdall of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.
intro.zh: 北族君主海姆達爾的盾牌.能夠禦寒.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are imbued with Annwn magic. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to give many status effects to an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 安溫魔法加持過的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手遭受異常狀態的機會.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are imbued with dragonic powers. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to blight an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋受龍之力量加持的弓箭。裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾，但有機會使對手陷入枯萎.

intro.en: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 索爾所持的至高魔弓.索爾建立了風暴之力不久後便屈服於墮落之力之下.他的魔弓能輕易的麻痺對手.

intro.en: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.
intro.zh: 赤騎瓦肯很少帶上的豪華權杖.瓦肯建立了煉獄騎士來對抗安溫的軍勢.他的法杖能輕易使對手燃燒.

intro.en: Helmet of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的赤騎瓦肯之頭盔.能防止被燃燒.

intro.en: Armor of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的赤騎瓦肯的盔甲.能防止被燃燒.

intro.en: Footwear of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的赤騎瓦肯之鞋.能防止被燃燒.

intro.en: A yellow crystal carried by Vulcan, the Red Knight. It increases magic power and mana when carried.
intro.zh: 瓦肯的黃色水晶.戴上它能增加魔力和魔力值.

intro.en: This staff of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.
intro.zh: 派磊的法杖永遠點燃著，它有高機率使敵人燃燒。

intro.en: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.
intro.zh: 派磊的長矛永遠點燃著，它有高機率使敵人燃燒。

intro.en: Buckler of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的赤騎瓦肯之盾.能防止被燃燒.

intro.en: A strong tonic brewed by Vulcan of the Inferno Knights. Consume it to slightly raise experience and items dropped for a limited time.
intro.zh: 煉獄騎士瓦肯釀造的精力藥.喝下它能在一段時間內稍微提升獲得的經驗值及掉寶率.

intro.en: A beautiful blade that resemble stars in the night sky.
intro.zh: 就像那夜空繁星般的美麗刀刃。

intro.en: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.
intro.zh: 被放逐的女巫卡門的象徵性頭飾.

intro.en: A ring that inhibits growth, greatly reducing the amount of experience earned while slightly increasing orns, gold, and items found.
intro.zh: 讓人不能長大的戒指,會大幅降低獲得的經驗值同時稍微提升獲得的歐幣,金幣和道具掉落率.

intro.en: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Using it may guide you to something interesting.
intro.zh: 附有最奇妙魔法的石頭.使用它能引導你到一些有趣的東西.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of arcane arts. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to burn, freeze, paralyze, or rot to spells.
intro.zh: 含有奧術知識的卷軸，它會犧牲持有者的護盾以增加魔攻，並有機會施放燃燒、冰凍、麻痺或腐爛咒語。

intro.en: A shield crested the image of a Griffin. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.
intro.zh: 描繪格里芬形象的盾.提升護盾的同時能抵抗龍系攻擊.

intro.en: Material imbued by the windy skies. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.
intro.zh: 富含暴風之力的礦石.能用來強化強力的武器.

intro.en: A bow signifying the great Griffin of the skies. Arrows shot from this bow can easily knock an opponent off-guard.
intro.zh: 這把弓體現了強大的格里芬在天空奔馳的英姿。它所射出的箭，則如疾風一般殺個對手措手不及。

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of dragon arts. It improves one's magic and mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance of blight to spells.
intro.zh: 內含龍族知識的卷軸.能提升使用者的魔力及魔力值,並有機會造成對手枯萎,但會犧牲掉護盾.

intro.en: The followers of Apollyon are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 這把巨大的鐮刀是令人生畏的亞坡倫追隨者所選用的武器。他有很高的機率使對手流血。

intro.en: An extremely odd staff, carried by a cryptid mimic. It can occasionally cause unpredicted status effects.
intro.zh: 詭異的寶箱怪持有的奇妙法杖.偶爾能造成無法預期的異常狀態.

intro.en: A bow signifying the great Griffin of the skies. Arrows shot from this bow can easily knock an opponent off-guard.
intro.zh: 這把弓體現了強大的格里芬在天空奔馳的英姿。它所射出的箭，則如疾風一般殺個對手措手不及。

intro.en: A shield crested the image of a Griffin. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.
intro.zh: 描繪格里芬形象的盾.提升護盾的同時能抵抗龍系攻擊.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of a Witch's arts. It improves one's mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to inflict many status effects to spells.
intro.zh: 包含女巫知識的捲軸。藉由犧牲護盾來提高法力值，同時在施法時有機會造成各種狀態異常。

intro.en: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.
intro.zh: 強大女巫的老舊黑暗法杖，可以稍微增加獲得的經驗值。

intro.en: Blade taken from Ankou's deadly scythe. Increases orns and experience earned.
intro.zh: 從安庫的死神鐮刀上取下的刀刃.能提升獲得的經驗和歐幣.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of basic magic. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward.
intro.zh: 內涵基礎魔法知識的卷軸.藉由犧牲護盾提升魔力.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of earthen. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to rot to spells.
intro.zh: 包含大地知識的卷軸，它犧牲護盾以增加持有者的魔攻，並增加施展腐爛咒的機率。

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of fire. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to burn to spells.
intro.zh: 具有火之知識的卷軸.藉著犧牲護盾能提升魔攻,施法時有機會造成燃燒.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of a Witch's arts. It improves one's mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to inflict many status effects to spells.
intro.zh: 包含女巫知識的捲軸。藉由犧牲護盾來提高法力值，同時在施法時有機會造成各種狀態異常。

intro.en: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.
intro.zh: 王室經常僱用流氓,以高品質的武器武裝他們.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of ice & water. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to freeze to spells.
intro.zh: 包含冰與水知識的卷軸，它會犧牲護盾以增加持有者的魔攻，並增加施展冰凍的機率。

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of poison arts. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to poison to spells.
intro.zh: 包含毒知識的卷軸，犧牲持有者的護盾以換取魔攻，並增加施展毒咒的機率。

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of lightning. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to paralyze to spells.
intro.zh: 內含雷電知識的卷軸.藉由犧牲護盾提升魔力,施展法術時有機率麻痺對手.

intro.en: Dark armor of an undead wanderer. Increases orns earned.
intro.zh: 不死流浪者所穿戴的黑暗盔甲，可以增加獲得的歐幣。

intro.en: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to the nearest shop in the world.
intro.zh: 附有神奇魔力的石頭.使用它能設置一個標記指向離你最近的商店.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that charged with the power of the earth below. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance cause an opponent to rot, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋受大地之力充能的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手腐爛的機會.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are easily frozen. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to freeze an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋易結凍的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手冰凍的機會.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that charged with the power of the sky. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to paralyze an opponent, at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 注入天空之力的箭矢.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但獲得讓對手麻痺的機會.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of basic magic. It improves one's magic and mana at the sacrifice of Ward.
intro.zh: 包含基礎魔法的卷軸，它會犧牲護盾以增加持有者的魔攻與魔力值。

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林所有的顯眼權杖.用它施法能有機會降低對手的物理防禦.

intro.en: Magical ring of Merlin, the famed sorcerer of Avalon. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林的魔戒.即使不懂魔法的麻瓜也能裝上它來用身體換取魔力.

intro.en: Harp found in Merlin's eccentric collection. It can grant elemental protection.
intro.zh: 於梅林的珍稀收藏中的豎琴。會提供元素防禦。

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林所有的顯眼權杖.用它施法能有機會降低對手的物理防禦.

intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林所有的顯眼權杖.用它施法能有機會降低對手的物理防禦.

intro.en: One of the rare potions of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It grants immense, but temporarily, magical prowess.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的珍稀藥水.雖然只有一小段時間,但能大幅提升魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.

intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of Merlin's lost arts. It improves one's mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to lower an opponent's attack power to spells.
intro.zh: 滿載梅林失落智慧的卷軸.藉由犧牲護盾來提升魔力值,並有機會降低對手的物理攻擊力.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection, this sword grants increased stats at the expense of attack power.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物,這把劍能犧牲物理攻擊力來換取其他能力的提升.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林所有的顯眼權杖.用它施法能有機會降低對手的物理防禦.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection, this dagger grants increased attack power at the expense of other stats.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物,這把匕首藉由犧牲其他能力來換取物理攻擊力的提升.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.
