intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: Large bow often carried by rangers of the wood.
intro.zh: 林地遊俠經常會使用的大弓.

intro.en: A mighty spear forged by dwarves for the great Nothren god, Odin. This spear can easily pierce an opponent's defenses, but must be wielded with both hands.
intro.zh: 北族主神奧丁打造的強力長矛.能輕易撕裂對手的防禦,但要用雙手才能揮舞它.

intro.en: A knotted staff of a follower of Mammon.
intro.zh: 瑪門的追隨者持有的法杖.

intro.en: Sword of a Lyonesse knight.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯騎士的長劍.

intro.en: A golden ore favored in use of forging Lyonesse weapons and armor.
intro.zh: 用來打造里昂內斯武器及盔甲的金黃色礦石.

intro.en: Staff of a Lyonesse warlock.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯術士的法杖.

intro.en: A thin blade favored by an Arcanic.
intro.zh: 奧術劍士最愛的薄刃.

intro.en: Helmet forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.
intro.zh: 用歐坦尼魔像遺骸製成的頭盔.犧牲魔法防禦來大幅強化物理防禦.

intro.en: An exotic helmet made of Chimera remains.
intro.zh: 利用奇美拉的殘骸所製作的頭盔。

intro.en: Helmet of a Lyonesse knight.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯騎士的頭盔.

intro.en: A dusty hood of a follower of Mammon.
intro.zh: 瑪門追隨者的灰黑兜帽.

intro.en: Hood of a Lyonesse warlock.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯術士的兜帽.

intro.en: A dusty robe of a follower of Mammon.
intro.zh: 瑪門追隨者的灰黑法袍.

intro.en: An exotic chest guard made of Chimera remains.
intro.zh: 利用奇美拉的殘骸所製作的護甲。

intro.en: Armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.
intro.zh: 使用歐坦尼魔像遺骸製成的盔甲.犧牲魔法防禦來大幅強化物理防禦.

intro.en: Robe of a Lyonesse warlock.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯術士的長袍.

intro.en: Armor of a Lyonesse knight.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯騎士的盔甲.

intro.en: Magical attire of Nothren lords. It protects one from fire, the weakness of the Nothren people.
intro.zh: 北方領主的魔法服.能抵抗北族人畏懼的火焰之力.

intro.en: Adorned robe of an infamous Gaia of the Earthen Legion.
intro.zh: 由大地軍團惡名昭彰的蓋亞所穿戴的長袍。

intro.en: Shield of a Lyonesse knight.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯騎士的盾.

intro.en: Dusty footwear of a follower of Mammon.
intro.zh: 瑪門追隨者的灰黑鞋子.

intro.en: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of Chimeric remains.
intro.zh: 用奇美拉遺骸做成的異國風厚腿甲.

intro.en: Leg armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.
intro.zh: 使用歐坦尼魔像遺骸製成的腿甲.犧牲魔法防禦來大幅強化物理防禦.

intro.en: Leg armor of a Lyonesse knight.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯騎士的腿甲.

intro.en: Footwear of a Lyonesse warlock.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯術士的鞋子.

intro.en: Helmet forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.
intro.zh: 用邪龍法夫納遺骸打造的頭盔.

intro.en: Leg armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.
intro.zh: 用邪龍法夫納遺骸打造的腿甲.

intro.en: A mighty pole-arm carried by Hades, the exiled guardian of the underworld.
intro.zh: 流亡的冥府鎮守者-黑帝斯的長柄武器.

intro.en: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of beasts.
intro.zh: 用來安撫最強力猛獸的樂器.

intro.en: The famed Crown of King Gradlon. Gradlon left Avalon to form the kingdom of Lyonesse a century ago. It is rumored that Lyonesse still stands, without their beloved King.
intro.zh: 格拉德隆王的王冠. 格拉德隆在百年前離開阿瓦隆並建立了里昂內斯王國.據說里昂內斯在失去了他們敬愛的國王之後依然屹立不搖.

intro.en: An ancient, strange weapon of ages. It is carried by Anubis, the Jackal, and can cause an opponent to bleed simply by casting a spell.
intro.zh: 胡狼阿努比斯所持有的古老且奇怪的武器，它可以透過施放咒語使對手流血。

intro.en: Katana of a Lyonesse assassin.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯刺客的武士刀.

intro.en: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯刺客的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯刺客的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Silent boots of a Lyonesse assassin.
intro.zh: 里昂內斯刺客的長靴.

intro.en: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more gold and orns.
intro.zh: 使用潛行於深海之物的遺骸打造的恐怖法杖.能讓怪物吐出更多金幣及歐幣.

intro.en: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.
intro.zh: 由溺死旅人的屍體變造而成的可怕法杖，可能會使墮落的野獸掉落更多的物品。

intro.en: A tome recounting the cursed stories of Fafnir. Increases experience earned at the expense of your potential.
intro.zh: 訴說著邪龍法夫納被詛咒事蹟的巨典.降低你的潛能來換取經驗值的提升.

intro.en: Shield of a fallen Lyonesse Vanguard.
intro.zh: 墮落里昂內斯先鋒的盾.

intro.en: Boots of an infamous Ifrit of the Inferno Knights.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的煉獄騎士伊夫利特之靴.

intro.en: Heavy armor of an infamous Leviathan of the Frozenguard.
intro.zh: 惡名昭彰的利維坦穿的重裝甲.

intro.en: Hood of an infamous Taranis of Stormforce.
intro.zh: 風暴之力惡名昭彰的塔拉尼斯兜帽。

intro.en: A staff often used in forbidden magic.
intro.zh: 通常用在禁忌魔法的法杖。

intro.en: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.
intro.zh: 被遺忘的惡作劇小妖的儀式刀。有高機率使對手中毒。

intro.en: An extremely odd staff, carried by a cryptid mimic. It can occasionally cause unpredicted status effects.
intro.zh: 詭異的寶箱怪持有的奇妙法杖.偶爾能造成無法預期的異常狀態.

intro.en: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.
intro.zh: 小妖精穿戴的奧術戒指，它可以增加魔力值及敏捷。

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are coated in a thick poison. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to poison or blight an opponent.
intro.zh: 一袋塗抹劇毒的弓箭。裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但有機會讓對手陷入中毒或枯萎.

intro.en: Headwear of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It protects its wearer from both poison and toxicity.
intro.zh: 淘氣妖精—納根因的頭飾，它可以保護穿戴者免疫中毒與劇毒。

intro.en: A ring of the arisen cursed Fafnir. Increases your attack and magic power at the expense of your longevity.
intro.zh: 重生的受詛咒法夫納的戒指.能折損壽命來換取物理及魔法攻擊力的提升.

intro.en: Armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.
intro.zh: 用邪龍法夫納遺骸打造的盔甲.

intro.en: Daggers carried by Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門所持的匕首.

intro.en: Staff of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的法杖.

intro.en: Axe of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的大斧.

other_effect: 技能: 豬突猛進 II

intro.en: A incredibly foul drink concocted by Naggeneen. It heavily poisons its consumer, but raises some stats.
intro.zh: 納根因調製的噁心飲料，它會使飲用者嚴重中毒，但會提升某些狀態。

intro.en: A simple pair of trusty shoes.
intro.zh: 一雙簡單可靠的鞋。

intro.en: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.
intro.zh: 巨魔的神奇護身符，可以增加許多屬性。

intro.en: Hood worn by a talented student of magic.
intro.zh: 熟練的魔法師學徒戴的兜帽.

intro.en: Shoes made to navigate thick marshland.
intro.zh: 做來穿越茂密沼澤的鞋子。

intro.en: Shoes worn by a talented student of magic.
intro.zh: 天才魔法學徒所穿戴的鞋子。

intro.en: An ageless golden shield capable of protecting one from petrification.
intro.zh: 可以保護持有者免疫石化的永恆黃金盾。

intro.en: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.
intro.zh: 有著詭異魔法加持的奇怪眼球.拿在手上能稍微提升身體素質.

intro.en: An intricate sword of the great Pumpkinhead. It offers immense attack power at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 強大的南瓜王持有的複雜之劍，它會犧牲護盾以增加許多物攻。

intro.en: A simple white sheet that one could use to mock a spirit. It protects one from falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 讓人模仿幽靈的白紙一枚.能防止被睡.

intro.en: A bag of treats of lore and luck. Carrying it increases gold, orns, and experience earned. You may also find more items.
intro.zh: 充滿知識與幸運的包包.帶著它能提升獲取的金幣、歐幣、經驗值及物品掉落率.

intro.en: A bag of tricks of lore and luck. Carrying it may add the chance for many status effects to your attacks and spells.
intro.zh: 一整袋的卑鄙招式，會使你的任何攻擊有機會造成負面效果。

intro.en: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.
intro.zh: 充滿魔物知識的巨著.能增加獲得的經驗值.

intro.en: The symbolic headwear of a nameless witch. It can protect one from status effects caused by the four basic elements.
intro.zh: 由無名女巫所配戴的象徵性頭飾，可以免疫四大元素的負面狀態。

intro.en: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time. Monsters defeated with this candle lit also give more experience.
intro.zh: 點燃此神秘蠟燭會在期間內吸引更強的敵人，這段期間擊敗魔物將給予更多的經驗值。

intro.en: The contorted staff of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.
intro.zh: 狄蜜特的扭曲法杖.在墮落之後,狄蜜特創造了大地軍團來維持世界的平衡.不幸的是,在不久之後便迎來他們的命運.

intro.en: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.
intro.zh: 白騎士以斯拉的冷冽法杖.以斯拉建立了寒霜守衛來對抗德肯尼亞族的入侵.

intro.en: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 索爾所持的至高魔弓.索爾建立了風暴之力不久後便屈服於墮落之力之下.他的魔弓能輕易的麻痺對手.

intro.en: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.
intro.zh: 赤騎瓦肯很少帶上的無暇長劍.瓦肯建立了煉獄騎士來對抗安溫的軍勢.他的劍能輕易使對手燃燒.

intro.en: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.
intro.zh: 赤騎瓦肯很少帶上的豪華權杖.瓦肯建立了煉獄騎士來對抗安溫的軍勢.他的法杖能輕易使對手燃燒.

intro.en: The contorted pole-arm of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.
intro.zh: 狄蜜特的棒棒.在墮落之後,狄蜜特創造了大地軍團來維持世界的平衡.不幸的是,在不久之後便迎來他們的命運.

intro.en: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.
intro.zh: 白騎士以斯拉的冷冽長劍.以斯拉建立了寒霜守衛來對抗德肯尼亞族的入侵.

intro.en: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 索爾持有的小槌子.索爾建立了風暴之力不久後便屈服於墮落之力之下.他的槌子能輕易的麻痺對手.

intro.en: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one can reflect on themselves and gain mana.
intro.zh: 鏡面盾牌.藉由犧牲護盾,能反映自己並獲得法力值.

intro.en: The fabled crown of King Arthus. Although it offers little in terms of defense, it can protect its wearer from being cursed or petrified.
intro.zh: 亞瑟王的傳奇王冠.雖然防禦性能不高,但戴上它能免疫於被詛咒或石化.

intro.en: An off-hand dagger used to parry an opponent's attacks. It boosts one's dexterity in expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 用來格擋對手攻勢的副手短刀.犧牲護盾來提升敏捷.

intro.en: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian rogues.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族俠盜所穿的重裝甲.

intro.en: A hood worn by Fomorian rogues.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族俠盜所穿的兜帽.

intro.en: Boots worn by Fomorian rogues.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族盜賊穿的靴子.

intro.en: The crown of a former Nothren King. It protects one from having their magic or attack powers weakened.
intro.zh: 前北族國王的王冠，它可以保護穿戴者免疫攻擊力下降。

intro.en: Ring of the King of Light. It helps one get a little extra step in the morning.
intro.zh: 光之王的戒指.讓你在早晨時能多走幾步路.

intro.en: A powerful magical sword of Ljosalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.
intro.zh: 日之精靈王族的魔法劍.能賦予持有者免疫於燃燒跟致盲的能力.

intro.en: Boots of a royal Ljosalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 皇家白精靈戰士的長靴.

intro.en: Chestplate of a royal Ljosalfar knight.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈騎士的胸甲.

intro.en: Ring of the King of Light. It can protect one from having their defenses lowered.
intro.zh: 光之王的戒指.戴上它能防止防禦降低.

intro.en: Hood of a royal Ljosalfar mage.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈法師的兜帽.

intro.en: A powerful magical greatbow of Ljosalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.
intro.zh: 日之精靈王族的魔法大弓.能賦予持有者免疫於燃燒跟致盲的能力.

intro.en: A powerful magical archstaff of Ljosalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.
intro.zh: 日之精靈王族的強力魔法權杖.賦予持有者免疫於燃燒跟致盲的能力.

intro.en: Light armor of a royal Ljosalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈的輕裝甲.

intro.en: Helmet of a royal Ljosalfar warrior.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈戰士的頭盔.

intro.en: A powerful magical sword of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈王族的魔法劍.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: A powerful magical greatbow of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈王族的魔法大弓.能賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: A powerful magical archstaff of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈王族的魔法權杖.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Cowl of a royal Dokkalfar assassin. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 皇家夜之精靈刺客的風帽.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Hood of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈皇家法師的兜帽.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的的能力.

intro.en: Helmet of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 皇家夜之精靈戰士的頭盔.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Robe of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 皇家夜之精靈法師的法袍.能賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 皇家夜之精靈戰士的裝甲.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Light armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 皇家夜之精靈戰士的輕裝甲.賦予持有者免疫於致盲跟入睡的能力.

intro.en: Boots of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 夜之精靈皇家戰士的長靴.能免疫致盲跟入睡.

intro.en: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It provides extra mana to help get through the night.
intro.zh: 暗黑女王的戒指.能供應額外的魔力值讓你度過漫長黑夜.

intro.en: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It can protect one from having their physical or magical prowess decreased.
intro.zh: 暗黑女王的戒指.能防止裝備者的物理或魔法攻擊力降低.

intro.en: Cowl of a royal Ljosalfar assassin.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈的風帽.

intro.en: Robe of a royal Ljosalfar mage.
intro.zh: 皇家日之精靈的法袍.

intro.en: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.
intro.zh: 展現魔狼芬里爾之力的魔法劍.能暫時降低對手的物防.

intro.en: Boy, it is dapper!
intro.zh: 潮到出水啦孩子們!

intro.en: Boy, it is dapper!
intro.zh: 潮到出水啦孩子們!

intro.en: Gifts for you and me. Greatly boosts the chance for monsters to drop items.
intro.zh: 給你和我的禮物.能大幅提升怪物掉落物品的機率.

intro.en: How could a piece of clothing make one so happy?
intro.zh: 為什麼一件衣服就能使人開心呢?

intro.en: A special lantern that can attract all sorts of beings.
intro.zh: 一盞能吸引各式生物的燈籠。

intro.en: Socks of a generous and plump man.
intro.zh: 一個慷慨豐滿的男人的襪子。

intro.en: Socks of a generous and plump man.
intro.zh: 一個慷慨豐滿的男人的襪子。

intro.en: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug.
intro.zh: 守財奴史古基追隨者所持有的強力獵弓。

intro.en: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste.
intro.zh: 史古基的追隨者持有的元氣拐杖糖.有人說味道還不錯.

intro.en: A strange concoction of a lost civilization. Drinking it in battle can add a little spring to your step.
intro.zh: 來自遺失文明的神奇調和飲料，在戰鬥中喝下它可使腳步變輕盈。

intro.en: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch.
intro.zh: 守財奴史古基的追隨者攜帶的閃閃發光的劍。摸起來令人寒心。

intro.en: A song is best sung with cheer.
intro.zh: 最好唱開心點的歌.

intro.en: A crystalline item capable of giving its carrier many temporary effects.
intro.zh: 可給予持有者多種暫時增益的水晶。

intro.en: A crystalline item capable of giving its carrier many temporary effects.
intro.zh: 可給予持有者多種暫時增益的水晶。

other_effect: 技能: 魔力燃燒 II

intro.en: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug.
intro.zh: 守財奴史古基追隨者所持有的強力獵弓。

intro.en: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch.
intro.zh: 守財奴史古基的追隨者攜帶的閃閃發光的劍。摸起來令人寒心。

intro.en: A song is best sung with cheer.
intro.zh: 最好唱開心點的歌.

intro.en: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste.
intro.zh: 史古基的追隨者持有的元氣拐杖糖.有人說味道還不錯.

intro.en: Sword and shield pairing of the fabled Mighty Slime.
intro.zh: 究極史萊姆持有的劍與盾。

intro.en: A destructive adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 來自毀滅的裝飾品，它能為裝備帶來許多能力提升。

intro.en: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to lower an opponent's attack when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上能降低對手攻擊的精巧飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment capable of granting additional experience earned to a piece of equipment when adorned.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在武器上能提升經驗值的小裝飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment capable of increasing the attack power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上能提升物攻的小飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment of the Titans capable of increasing the defenses of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上能提升防禦力的小小泰坦裝飾.

intro.en: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to paralyze, rot, burn, or freeze an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.
intro.zh: 一種小裝飾品，鑲嵌在裝備上可以獲得麻痺、腐蝕、燃燒或冰凍對手的能力。

intro.en: A relic of Mammon capable of granting a piece of equipment additional power while occasionally lowering an opponent's attack or magical power.
intro.zh: 帶有瑪門法力的聖遺物,鑲嵌在裝備上除了提升能力外偶爾還能降低對手的物理或魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: A small adornment of Fomoria capable of increasing the magical defense of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌時能提升魔法防禦的弗摩爾族裝飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment of Draconia capable of increasing the attack power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 裝飾此德隆尼亞的小飾品可以提升物攻。

intro.en: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to lower an opponent's magical defenses when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上時能有機會降低對手魔防的小飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment of Avalon capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 一個阿瓦隆的小裝飾品，他能夠為裝飾的裝備提升很多種屬性。

intro.en: An adornment of assassins. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 刺客使用的裝飾品。當裝飾在武器上時，使你有機會破壞對手的防禦。

intro.en: A small adornment of the stars capable of increasing the magical power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上時能提升魔攻的星星裝飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment of Balor capable of increasing the dexterity and Ward of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上石能提升敏捷和護盾的精巧巴羅爾裝飾品.

intro.en: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的俠盜所穿的長靴.

intro.en: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的追隨者所穿的鞋子.

intro.en: A heavy shield carried by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris. It grants one immunity to being Cursed.
intro.zh: 所屬於傲慢的惡魔-瑪門的騎士所持的厚重盾牌.能免疫於被詛咒.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: Crude blade of the Lizarr.
intro.zh: 蜥蜴人的粗刃。

intro.en: A small adornment capable of increasing the mana granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上能提升魔力值的小飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment capable of increasing the magic defense of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌在裝備上能提升魔防的小飾品.

intro.en: A small adornment capable of increasing the HP granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 一個小裝飾品，當鑲嵌在裝備上可以增加生命值。

intro.en: Simple shoes worn by students of magic.
intro.zh: 魔法學徒所穿的簡易鞋子.

intro.en: A ring crafted for certain slender fingers. It grants protection from the darkness; one cannot fall asleep or become cursed while wearing it.
intro.zh: 特別為了纖細手指而打造的戒指。能保護你免於黑暗之中。戴上它能防止陷入睡眠或詛咒的異常狀態。

intro.en: A pendant found within wreckage, deep within the sea. It protects its wearer from blight, poison, rot, and toxic.
intro.zh: 於深海廢墟所發現的吊飾，它可以保護穿戴者免疫枯萎、中毒、腐爛及劇毒。

intro.en: A small adornment of the deep sea capable of increasing the magical defenses of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 深海的小飾物,鑲嵌在裝備上時能夠增強其魔法防禦力.

intro.en: Blinders often used to quell a Kelpie's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.
intro.zh: 用來安撫凱爾皮的馬眼罩，它可以增加持有者的敏捷和爆擊率。

intro.en: An adornment of the blasphemous. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's magical resistance.
intro.zh: 褻瀆的裝飾品。當裝飾在武器上時，有機會降低對手的魔防。

intro.en: Archistaff forged of the remains of a great Hydra. It can provide one with various elemental resistances.
intro.zh: 利用九頭蛇的遺骸所製成的權杖。能獲得元素防禦。

intro.en: A powerful magical greatbow of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.
intro.zh: 來自未知皇室的強力魔法長弓，它可以使持有者免疫燃燒與致盲。

intro.en: The feather of a Turul. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 圖魯的羽毛.鑲嵌上它能提升敏捷.

intro.en: A ring of Annwn royalty. Its arcane enchantment grants the immunity to element status conditions.
intro.zh: 安溫皇室的戒指.它附有的奧術魔力能使你免疫於元素性的異常狀態.

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.
intro.zh: 可於戰鬥中提升物攻的酸藥劑。

intro.en: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.
intro.zh: 可以提升魔力的酸酸藥水.

intro.en: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.
intro.zh: 附有幽光魔力的法杖.

intro.en: The feather of a Zu. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 祖鳥的羽毛，鑲嵌時可以提供裝甲額外的敏捷。

intro.en: The feather of a Carrion Crow. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 食腐烏鴉的羽毛。裝飾時可以提升敏捷。

intro.en: The feather of a Buzzard. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 禿鷹的羽毛，鑲嵌在裝備上可以增加敏捷。

intro.en: A staff of the revered Yokai. It may lower an opponent's magical defenses.
intro.zh: 令人敬畏的妖怪所持有的法杖，它可以降低對手的魔防。

intro.en: A fine blade crafted of a bat's remains. It slightly drains HP from enemies as damage is dealt.
intro.zh: 用蝙蝠遺骸製成的精美刀刃。它會從造成的傷害量中吸取生命值。

intro.en: Crude armor made of the remains of a crow. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.
intro.zh: 烏鴉遺體製成的粗糙盔甲，雖只提供少量的物防，但可以增加你的敏捷。

intro.en: The staff of a draugr. It grants additional mana.
intro.zh: 屍鬼的法杖.能提升魔力值.

intro.en: A powerful dark archistaff of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.
intro.zh: 來自無名皇室強大的黑暗權杖，它能讓持有者在戰鬥中免疫致盲及睡眠。

intro.en: Archistaff forged of the remains of a great Hydra. It can provide one with various elemental resistances.
intro.zh: 利用九頭蛇的遺骸所製成的權杖。能獲得元素防禦。

intro.en: A sharp pair of daggers. They slightly drain HP from an enemies with damage dealt.
intro.zh: 一雙鋒利的匕首。它們會從造成的傷害量中吸取生命值。

intro.en: A powerful magical archistaff of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.
intro.zh: 無名皇家的魔法權杖.能免疫於燃燒和致盲.

intro.en: The bow of a mystic. It slightly raises your dexterity.
intro.zh: 秘術士的弓.能稍微提升敏捷.

intro.en: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.
intro.zh: 提供更高魔防的神祕盔甲。

intro.en: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.
intro.zh: 能提升魔防的秘術盾牌.

intro.en: An ageless golden shield capable of protecting one from petrification.
intro.zh: 可以保護持有者免疫石化的永恆黃金盾。

intro.en: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one can reflect on themselves and gain mana.
intro.zh: 鏡面盾牌.藉由犧牲護盾,能反映自己並獲得法力值.

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.
intro.zh: 有些法師也很擅長格鬥.這是他們的靴子.

intro.en: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold and orns earned.
intro.zh: 有趣的宮廷小丑服裝。它能增加賺取的金幣和歐幣。

intro.en: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 這個獨特的頭飾無法提供太多的保護，但它很適合鑲嵌。

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.
intro.zh: 有些法師對格鬥也略知一二.這頭盔就是他們用的.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows that are imbued with unknown magic. They greatly increase one's attack power at the sacrifice of Ward.
intro.zh: 一袋受未知法術加持的弓箭.裝備在副手時會犧牲護盾但大幅提升使用者的物攻.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of unstable magic. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward.
intro.zh: 包含不穩定魔法知識的卷軸，它會犧牲護盾以增加持有者的魔法攻擊力。

intro.en: An old sage's cane.
intro.zh: 老聖人的手杖。

intro.en: A simple flute made of brass. It may lull an enemy to sleep.
intro.zh: 黃銅製成的簡易長笛，它有機率可以催眠敵人。

intro.en: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.
intro.zh: 讓人想起可怕雪人的大衣，它可以保護穿戴者免受冰凍及防禦力下降。

intro.en: A powerful magical sword of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from burning and blindness.

intro.en: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

intro.zh: 從被詛咒的雞蛇身上拔下的羽毛.藉由降低物理攻擊來提升物理防禦.

intro.en: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional attack power at the expense of physical defense and mana.
intro.zh: 從詛咒雞蛇的遺骸中拔出的羽毛。它以犧牲物防和魔力值為代價，賦予了額外的攻擊力。

intro.en: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional magic resistance at the expense of magical power.
intro.zh: 從詛咒雞蛇的遺骸中拔出的羽毛。它以犧牲魔法攻擊力為代價，賦予了額外的魔法防禦力。

intro.en: Armor of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.
intro.zh: 第三騎士的盔甲.能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害.

intro.en: Cloak of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.
intro.zh: 第三騎士的披風.能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害.

intro.en: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.
intro.zh: 有些魔法師也擅長格鬥.這就是他們的盔甲.

intro.en: Decorated shield of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded and may occasionally protect you from other status effects.
intro.zh: 墮落鳳凰的敬拜者的華美盾牌.穿上它時能免疫致盲且偶爾能抵抗其他異常狀態.

intro.en: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德所做的奇妙小物.鑲嵌到裝甲上能有很多好處.

intro.en: Scythe of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It is suitable for both attacking and casting spells, reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses, and has a small chance to curse an opponent.
intro.zh: 最終騎士的鐮刀.不論物理或魔法攻擊都能使用,同時能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害,且有小機率能詛咒對手.

intro.en: Staff of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can cause an opponent to be poisoned or blighted.
intro.zh: 第二騎士的法杖.能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害並能造成對手中毒或枯萎.

intro.en: A strange eye imbued with cursed magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats and protect you from blindness.
intro.zh: 附著詛咒魔法的詭異眼球.帶著它能稍微提升身體素質並防止被盲目.

intro.en: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. It increases your ability to see, prevents blindness, and may occasionally increase your dexterity in battle.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌水晶之眼的強力法杖，它可以加強你的視力，免疫致盲，並有機會於戰鬥中增加你的敏捷。

intro.en: Is it the thrill of the fight?
intro.zh: 這就是戰慄的感覺嗎?

intro.en: Polearm of the First Horseman, often associated with great famine. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.
intro.zh: 第一騎士的長矛.能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害.

intro.en: Blunt weapon of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can easily stun or decrease the dexterity of an opponent.
intro.zh: 第三騎士的鈍器.能降低副本頭目究極攻擊的傷害並能輕易暈眩對手或降低其敏捷.

intro.en: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的輕裝甲.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且能提升護盾.

intro.en: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的輕裝甲.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且能提升護盾.

intro.en: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的頭盔.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且戴上它能提供額外的生命值.

intro.en: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的頭盔.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且戴上它能提供額外的生命值.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: Decorated shield of Surtr, the Southern wanderer. It increases defense and resistance at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的華美盾牌.能提升物理及魔法防禦,其代價是降低護盾.

intro.en: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的靴子.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且能提升敏捷.

intro.en: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.
intro.zh: 無比閃耀的史爾特爾之劍.其永恆熾盛的光芒能輕而易舉地讓對手盲目並吸引更多魔物前來.

intro.en: Decorated shield of Surtr, the Southern wanderer. It increases defense and resistance at the expense of Ward.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的華美盾牌.能提升物理及魔法防禦,其代價是降低護盾.

intro.en: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 南方流浪者-史爾特爾的靴子.很適合鑲嵌裝飾品且能提升敏捷.

intro.en: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.
intro.zh: 無比閃耀的史爾特爾之劍.其永恆熾盛的光芒能輕而易舉地讓對手盲目並吸引更多魔物前來.

intro.en: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.
intro.zh: 由北方精靈戰士持有的華麗武器，它擁有額外的鑲嵌槽。

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林所有的顯眼權杖.用它施法能有機會降低對手的物理防禦.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: Harp found in Merlin's eccentric collection. It can grant elemental protection.
intro.zh: 於梅林的珍稀收藏中的豎琴。會提供元素防禦。

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼法袍.穿上它能防止自己的魔法防禦力被降低.

intro.en: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
intro.zh: 阿瓦隆王國著名的巫師梅林持有的顯眼兜帽.

intro.en: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.
intro.zh: 梅林珍稀收藏中的聖物.

intro.en: A scroll containing a terrible incantation that will turn the world crimson. Using this scroll will cause enemies of any habitat to show for a limited time, but may be more difficult to defeat.
intro.zh: 使世界變為深紅色的混沌卷軸。使用它會在有限的時間內顯示任何棲息地的敵人，但他們可能會更難擊敗。

intro.en: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. Increases your ability to see.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌水晶之眼的強力法杖，可以增加你的視野。

intro.en: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.
intro.zh: 結實的絲線製成的堅固弩箭。

intro.en: An axe and shield combination of the mighty Behemoth. Attacks with its might may decrease an opponent's defense temporarily.
intro.zh: 貝西摩斯的斧和盾.用他的蠻力攻擊有機會暫時使對手的防禦力降低.

intro.en: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的強力大斧.

intro.en: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的優良法杖.

intro.en: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 利用古龍堤豐的遺骸所精心製作的弓。

intro.en: Ceremonial blade of a long forgotten civilization. It has a small chance of cursing an opponent.
intro.zh: 失落國度的儀式劍.有小機率能詛咒對手.

intro.en: A foggy, mysterious blade. It may blind an opponent.
intro.zh: 霧濛濛的神秘之刃。可能會使對手致盲。

intro.en: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍提亞馬特的遺骸打造的高超大弓.

intro.en: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍堤豐的遺體打造的高級法杖.

intro.en: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.
intro.zh: 使用遠古巨龍堤豐的遺骸精心打造的強力大斧.

intro.en: A torch, carried in one's off-hand. It increases your sight, prevents blindness, and may cause an opponent to light aflame in battle.
intro.zh: 副手能裝的火炬.能提升你的視野,防止被盲目,還能使對手像蠟燭一樣燒起來.

intro.en: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.
intro.zh: 古老元素神所穿戴的戒指，可以增加獲得的金幣、歐幣及經驗值。

intro.en: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.
intro.zh: 辣個男人-卡爾的戒指，可以稍微增加一些狀態。

intro.en: Headwear decorated with the horns of a great Yeti. Healing items will recover more HP and mana while wearing these horns. They are also well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 用高等雪怪的角裝飾的頭盔.裝備它時回復藥品能回復更多.它也很適合鑲嵌裝飾品.

intro.en: An exotic chest guard made of Chimera remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.
intro.zh: 利用奇美拉的殘骸所製作的護甲。裝備此物品可提高追隨者的力量。

intro.en: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of Chimeric remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.
intro.zh: 使用奇美拉殘骸做的厚重腿甲.穿上它能提升你跟隨者的能力.

intro.en: An exotic helmet made of Chimera remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.
intro.zh: 利用奇美拉的殘骸所製作的盔甲。裝備此物品可提高追隨者的力量。

intro.en: The robe of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 被稱為盧恩的失落民族的法師之袍. 穿上它會略微降低魔力消耗。它也非常適合做裝飾。

intro.en: The boots of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 被稱為盧恩的失落民族的法師之靴. 穿上它會略微降低魔力消耗。它也非常適合做裝飾。

intro.en: The hat of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 被稱為盧恩的失落民族的法師之帽. 戴上它會略微降低魔力消耗。它也非常適合做裝飾。

intro.en: A simple line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.
intro.zh: 簡單的釣魚線,適合去海底撈. 靠近水邊時使用能開始釣魚.

intro.en: A stronger fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.
intro.zh: 強壯點的釣魚線,適合去海底撈. 在靠近水的時候使用能開始釣魚.

intro.en: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.
intro.zh: 很強壯的釣魚線,適合去海底撈. 在靠近水的時候使用能開始釣魚.

intro.en: A small fish.
intro.zh: 小魚啦.

intro.en: Quite a rare fish, seemingly ascended from the Underworld.
intro.zh: 相當稀有的魚，看似從地底中竄出。

intro.en: Ouch! It bit you.
intro.zh: 啊! 你被咬了.

intro.en: A violent fish. Stories say these fish can bring down a mighty bear.
intro.zh: 超狂的魚。傳說這隻魚一拳打死熊。

intro.en: A green-hued fish, slightly rarer than what one would usually see.
intro.zh: 綠色的魚 , 比常見的魚稍微稀有一點.

intro.en: A medium sized fish, often seen in larger bodies of water.
intro.zh: 中型魚，通常在較大的水域中看到。

intro.en: A small fish.
intro.zh: 小魚啦.

intro.en: Footwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.
intro.zh: 墮落鳳凰的敬拜者的腿甲.穿上它時偶爾能抵抗異常狀態.

intro.en: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.
intro.zh: 很強壯的釣魚線,適合去海底撈. 在靠近水的時候使用能開始釣魚.

intro.en: Amulet often carried by highly ranked Nothren warriors. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower and may cause them to act more often.
intro.zh: 常被高階的北族戰士使用的護身符.戴上它能強化你跟隨者的能力並促使他們行動更頻繁.

intro.en: Amulet often carried by highly ranked Dragoons. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower and may cause them to act more often.
intro.zh: 高階龍騎士常會配戴的護身符.戴上它能強化你寵物的能力並促使他們更頻繁的行動.

intro.en: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-瑪查的詛咒法杖.提升持有者魔法攻擊力的同時對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹們使用的詛咒魯特琴.提升物理防禦的同時也能對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-摩莉甘的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-芭德布的詛咒大弓.提升持有者的敏捷的同時能對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.zh: 偉大女巫-摩莉甘的追隨者的詛咒輕裝甲.

intro.en: An amulet carried by most talented of healers. Wearing this item will increase the effectiveness of healing items.
intro.zh: 最天賦異稟的治療師在用的護身符.戴上它能提升回復藥品的效果.

intro.en: A quiver of arrows carried by Badb, the rogue witch. Carrying them will increase both attack power and dexterity, while potentially poisoning or causing an opponent to rot.
intro.zh: 俠盜女巫-芭德布持有的箭筒.帶著它能提升物理攻擊力及敏捷,並有機會造成對手中毒或腐爛.

intro.en: Cursed light armor of a follower of Badb, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-芭德布的追隨者的詛咒輕裝甲.

intro.en: A strange side-arm once carried by Apollyon until pilfered by Morrigan. It doesn't offer much in terms of power, but its indentations are well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 曾經是亞坡倫的隨身武器,後來被摩莉甘竊取.雖然沒辦法提升太多攻擊力,但其設計很適合鑲嵌裝飾品.

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-瑪查的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: A scroll of Macha, offering secrets of her craft. It increases magic and mana, while protecting you from having your magical prowess weakened.
intro.zh: 展現瑪查神秘工藝的卷軸.能提升魔法攻擊力及魔力值,並防止自身魔力被弱化.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-瑪查的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-瑪查的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-瑪查的詛咒法杖.提升持有者魔法攻擊力的同時對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed shield of a follower of Neman, the great witch. It offers protection from being put to sleep.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒之盾.能防止入睡.

intro.en: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-瑪查的詛咒法杖.提升持有者魔法攻擊力的同時對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: A scroll containing knowledge of the most vile of arts. It improves one's magic and mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to greatly diminish an opponent's resistance to spells.
intro.zh: 滿載卑鄙美學知識的卷軸.藉由犧牲護盾來提升持有者的魔力及魔力值,並有機會大幅降低對手的魔法防禦力.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-妮潘的詛咒長劍.提升持有者物理攻擊力的同時對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒重裝甲.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-摩莉甘的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.
intro.zh: 很強壯的釣魚線,適合去海底撈. 在靠近水的時候使用能開始釣魚.

intro.en: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-芭德布的詛咒大弓.提升持有者的敏捷的同時能對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed robe of a follower of Macha, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-瑪查的追隨者的詛咒法袍.

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-瑪查的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: A feather pulled from the remains of a fallen Phoenix.
intro.zh: 從墮落鳳凰的遺骸取下的羽毛.

name.zh: 黃褐色的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to paralyze an opponent.
intro.zh: 地獄犬的結晶之眼。很大機率使攻擊造成癱瘓狀態。

intro.en: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the power of your follower.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的耐用兜帽。它們大大提高了跟隨者的能力。

name.zh: 翠綠色的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to rot.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯的結晶之眼。很大機率使攻擊造成腐爛狀態。

name.zh: 碧藍色的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to freeze.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯的結晶之眼。很大機率使攻擊造成冰凍狀態。

intro.en: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They greatly increase the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 由刻耳柏洛斯的爪鍛造的尖銳鋸齒刀刃。它們大大提高了跟隨者的行動率。

intro.en: Mighty staff, representative of the feral Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 野性的刻耳柏洛斯最具代表性的法杖.能提升你的跟隨者的行動率.

intro.en: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的劍。它們大大提高了跟隨者的行動率。

name.zh: 血紅色的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to burn.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯的結晶之眼。很大機率使攻擊造成燃燒狀態。

intro.en: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They greatly increase the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 由刻耳柏洛斯的爪鍛造的尖銳鋸齒刀刃。它們大大提高了跟隨者的行動率。

intro.en: Mighty staff, representative of the feral Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 野性的刻耳柏洛斯最具代表性的法杖.能提升你的跟隨者的行動率.

intro.en: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的劍。它們大大提高了跟隨者的行動率。

intro.en: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the power of your follower.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的耐用兜帽。它們大大提高了跟隨者的能力。

intro.en: A gigantic shield often used to protect one from the wildest of wolves. It offers additional defense at the expense of power.
intro.zh: 保護持有者免受野狼群侵害的巨大盾牌，它會犧牲攻擊力以換取額外的物防。

intro.en: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒重裝甲.

intro.en: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will greatly increase one's attack and magic powers, but become afflicted with a variety of illnesses.
intro.zh: 納根因收藏的蘑菇.吃下去的人會提升物攻和魔攻,但也會受劇毒之苦.

intro.en: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will cause one to enrage, but become afflicted with Toxic.
intro.zh: 納根因收藏的蘑菇.吃下去的人會被激怒,但也會受劇毒之苦.

intro.en: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.
intro.zh: 常用於保護肺部的厚織物。戴上它可以減少遭受異常狀態的機會。

intro.en: A spore of a toxic mushroom. Adorning it upon a weapon can add a variety of status effects to your attacks.
intro.zh: 擁有劇毒的蘑菇袍子，鑲嵌在武器上會使你的攻擊造成各種負面狀態。

intro.en: A curious wand carried by the foul Naggeneen. Spells cast with this wand may cause your opponent to become poisoned or blighted.
intro.zh: 髒兮兮納根因的棒棒.使用它來施展法術能有機會造成對手中毒或枯萎.

intro.en: An off-hand dagger carried by the foul Naggeneen. It is encased in a deadly poison.
intro.zh: 髒兮兮納根因所持的短刀.能造成致命劇毒.

intro.en: An off-hand dagger carried by the foul Naggeneen. It is encased in a deadly poison.
intro.zh: 髒兮兮納根因所持的短刀.能造成致命劇毒.

intro.en: A curious wand carried by the foul Naggeneen. Spells cast with this wand may cause your opponent to become poisoned or blighted.
intro.zh: 髒兮兮納根因的棒棒.使用它來施展法術能有機會造成對手中毒或枯萎.

intro.en: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.
intro.zh: 常用於保護肺部的厚織物。戴上它可以減少遭受異常狀態的機會。

intro.en: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的附魔腰帶.能防止被燃燒並提升生命值.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: The powerful, fiery axe of Cerus, the untamed bull. It has a good chance of stunning or burning an opponent.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的勇猛斧頭.有高機率暈眩或燃燒對手.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: Helmet of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 暴怒金牛凱魯斯的頭盔. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: Armor of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 暴怒金牛凱魯斯的鎧甲. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: The powerful, fiery staff of Cerus, the untamed bull.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的強力法杖.

intro.en: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的兜帽. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: Adornment of the First Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will slightly protect one from status ailments.
intro.zh: 第一騎士的裝飾品，鑲嵌它在盔甲上可以輕微保護穿戴者免受疾病影響。

intro.en: Adornment of the Final Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.
intro.zh: 最終騎士的裝飾品，鑲嵌它在武器上可以提升跟隨者的行動率及屬性。

intro.en: Adornment of the Second Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will moderately protect one from status ailments.
intro.zh: 第二騎士的裝飾品，鑲嵌它在盔甲上可以適度保護穿戴者免受疾病影響。

intro.en: Adornment of the Third Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the distance that you can see.
intro.zh: 第三騎士的裝飾品，鑲嵌在武器上能提升你的視野。

intro.en: Daggers carried by the Realmshifter. They have the increased chance of causing a critical hit.
intro.zh: 域界易形者所持有的匕首，它可以增加暴擊的機率。

intro.en: Heavy axe of the Gilgamesh.
intro.zh: 吉爾伽美什重斧。

intro.en: A decorated robe often worn by the Heretics. It grants additional magic power, but spells cast will consume more mana.
intro.zh: 通常由赫勒提克穿戴的裝飾長袍，它可以額外增加魔法攻擊力，但是會消耗更多魔力值。

intro.en: Amulet often carried by the Beowulf. Wearing this item greatly increases the power of your follower,  may cause them to act less often.
intro.zh: 通常為貝奧武夫持有的護身符，穿戴它可以大幅強化跟隨者，但可能會導致他們行動頻率降低。

intro.en: Red eye of the Behemoth. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.
intro.zh: 貝西摩斯的紅色眼球，鑲嵌它在武器上可以增加跟隨者的行動機率及屬性。

intro.en: Azure staff of Castor, the Dioscuri magician. Castor and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.
intro.zh: 魔法師卡斯托耳的法杖.卡斯托耳和其雙子弟弟除非閒到不行才會離開那深海.

intro.en: The Twinbow of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.
intro.zh: 融合的狄奧斯庫洛伊兄弟持有的雙子弓，它對於喜歡在戰鬥中使用混合方法作戰的人提供額外的攻擊力。

intro.en: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.
intro.zh: 狂戰士波魯克斯的大斧.波魯克斯和其雙子兄長除非閒到不行才會離開那深海.

name.zh: 蔚藍狄奧斯庫洛伊之戒

intro.en: The ring of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.
intro.zh: 融合的狄奧斯庫洛伊兄弟持有的戒指，它對於喜歡在戰鬥中使用混合方法作戰的人提供額外的攻擊力。

name.zh: 臭酸的狄奧斯庫洛伊蜂蜜酒

intro.en: Consume with caution.
intro.zh: 古靈精怪槍!謹慎使用。

intro.en: Some say the Cure-all is a bit of snake oil. This concoction aims to cure its drinker of many ailments.
intro.zh: 有人說百寶丹是由一點蛇油所製成，這個調和劑用來治療各種疾病。

intro.en: A restorative elixir that removes any stat lowering ailments against you.
intro.zh: 能移除任何降低屬性之異常狀態的恢復性秘藥。

intro.en: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.
intro.zh: 全能的騎士巴林用來施展攻擊劍術的大劍.他的斬擊能降低對手的物理或魔法攻擊力.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把彎刀正是其中之一.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把武士刀正是他的最愛,能輕易弱化對手.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.
intro.zh: 德高望重的阿瓦隆騎士的重裝甲.

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止物理或魔法防禦被降低.

intro.en: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德的發明之一.這小東西能防止敏捷,物理或魔法攻擊被降低.

intro.en: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 偉大發明家卡德所做的奇妙小物.鑲嵌到裝甲上能有很多好處.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把大劍正是其中之一.

intro.en: A greatsword often used in defensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical defenses.
intro.zh: 全能的騎士巴林用來施展防衛劍術的大劍.他的斬擊能降低對手的物理或魔法防禦力.

intro.en: The easily recognizable pole-arm of Cade, the great Avalonian inventor. Its hidden features can cause a variety of status effects.
intro.zh: 偉大的阿瓦隆發明家卡德廣為人知的長武器.能造成多種異常狀態.

intro.en: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.
intro.zh: 劍術大師芬尼斯因身上背著無數的劍而聞名.這把西洋劍正是其中之一.

intro.en: When lit, this candle is said to draw near monsters that you have accepted a quest for.
intro.zh: 點燃此蠟燭會吸引任務怪靠近。

intro.en: Archistaff of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔瑪門的權杖.

intro.en: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.
intro.zh: 適合用來裝釀造的藥劑、藥水或秘藥的大瓶子。拜訪藥劑師能裝滿它。

intro.en: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.
intro.zh: 適合用來裝釀造的藥劑、藥水或秘藥的大瓶子。拜訪藥劑師能裝滿它。

intro.en: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.
intro.zh: 適合用來裝釀造的藥劑、藥水或秘藥的大瓶子。拜訪藥劑師能裝滿它。

intro.en: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.
intro.zh: 適合用來裝釀造的藥劑、藥水或秘藥的大瓶子。拜訪藥劑師能裝滿它。

intro.en: A small bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.
intro.zh: 適合用來裝釀造的藥劑、藥水或秘藥的小瓶子。拜訪藥劑師能裝滿它。

intro.en: A sprig of silphium. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.
intro.zh: 羅盤草的嫩枝。能在藥劑師處用來調製藥水。

intro.en: A stalk of nightshade. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.
intro.zh: 夜影的梗。在藥劑師處能用來製作藥水。

intro.en: A single leaf of mandrake. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.
intro.zh: 曼德拉草的葉子。在藥劑師處能用來調製藥水。

intro.en: A stalk of dayleaf. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.
intro.zh: 日之葉的梗，可以在藥劑師那裡製作一些藥水。

intro.en: Archistaff of Mammon, the demon of hubris.
intro.zh: 傲慢的惡魔瑪門的權杖.

intro.en: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one should have been able to reflect on themselves and gain mana. But alas, it is cracked.
intro.zh: 鏡面盾牌.藉由犧牲護盾,能反映自己並獲得法力值.阿不過它是破的.

intro.en: Boots of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.
intro.zh: 墮落的生命象徵，世界樹之靴。穿戴它可以免疫暈眩。

intro.en: Cowl of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.
intro.zh: 墮落的生命象徵，世界樹之風帽。穿戴它可能可以減少你對自己造成的傷害。

intro.en: Garb of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.
intro.zh: 墮落的生命象徵，世界樹之皮甲。穿戴它可能可以偶爾大幅增加你的力量。

intro.en: Heavy leggings of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.
intro.zh: 墮落的生命象徵，世界樹之重腿甲。穿戴它可以免疫暈眩。

intro.en: Hood of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

intro.en: Poison tipped arrows of Hel, the shadowed rogue. The quiver offers additional slots for adornment and may protect one via Ward.
intro.zh: 暗影俠盜赫爾的毒箭。此箭袋提供額外的鑲嵌洞並可藉由護盾保護持有者。

intro.zh: 使用了巴羅爾惡魔達格達之遺骸打造的防具。因著達格達的自癒能力，治療用的道具會恢復額外的HP與MP。

intro.en: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.
intro.zh: 使用了巴羅爾惡魔達格達之遺骸打造的防具。因著達格達的自癒能力，治療用的道具會恢復額外的HP與MP。

intro.en: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.
intro.zh: 使用了巴羅爾惡魔達格達之遺骸打造的防具。因著達格達的自癒能力，治療用的道具會恢復額外的HP與MP。

intro.en: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.
intro.zh: 使用了巴羅爾惡魔達格達之遺骸打造的防具。因著達格達的自癒能力，治療用的道具會恢復額外的HP與MP。

intro.en: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.
intro.zh: 由最有天賦的北族女武神持有的稀有劍刃。它可能會給予古娜態勢，提高攻擊力但降低防禦力。

intro.en: Boots of a Draconian rogue.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族俠盜長靴。

intro.en: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族俠盜風帽。

intro.en: A robe of a Draconian mage.
intro.zh: 德肯尼亞族法師長袍。

intro.en: A dark, dusty robe typically worn by Balor mages.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾法師標配的暗黑法袍.

intro.en: Heavy armor typically worn by Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士標配的重裝甲.

intro.en: A heavy helmet typically worn by Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士所配戴的重型頭盔。

intro.en: Heavy leggings typically worn by Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士標配的重腿甲.

intro.en: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾戰士的裝飾盾.

intro.en: A commonly used sword of knights of Balor.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾騎士常使用的劍。

intro.en: Katana wielded by Balor rogues. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾俠盜使用的武士刀，有高機率使敵人流血。

intro.en: Staff wielded by Balor mages. It increases mana at the expense of health.
intro.zh: 巴羅爾法師的法杖.能藉由犧牲體力來換取魔力.

intro.en: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.
intro.zh: 稀有的沙之彎刀。稍微增加賺取的金幣。

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-妮潘的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.
intro.zh: 摩莉甘的姊妹-妮潘的詛咒長劍.提升持有者物理攻擊力的同時對敵人造成相對的影響.

intro.en: Cursed legwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-芭德布的追隨者的詛咒腿甲.

intro.en: Cursed light armor of a follower of Badb, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-芭德布的追隨者的詛咒輕裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian rogues.
intro.zh: 弗摩爾族俠盜所穿的重裝甲.

intro.en: Heavy armor of Nothren valkyries.
intro.zh: 北族女武神的重鎧甲.

intro.en: Cursed headwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.
intro.zh: 偉大女巫-芭德布的追隨者的詛咒頭帽.

intro.en: A gift for another. Open it to find out what it could be.
intro.zh: 來自別人的禮物。打開它看看裡面有什麼吧。

intro.en: A trinket carried by an Alfar. Using it will increase your chances of finding something rarer when opening Stranger's Gifts.
intro.zh: 古精靈持有的小飾物。使用它能提升你在開箱陌生人的禮物時拿到更稀有道具的機率。

intro.en: A tonic that improves eyesight. Consuming this item will increase your view distance for a limited time.
intro.zh: 提升視野的藥水。喝下它能在一定時間內提升你的視野。

intro.en: A simple concoction. Consuming it may attract extra monsters to you.
intro.zh: 就是個調劑。用了它能吸引更多的怪物。

intro.en: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.
intro.zh: 香甜又營養的藥水。讓你的跟隨者喝下就能在一定時間內提升它們的行動機率。

intro.en: An adornment depicting a healthy gazing eye. Adorning it upon a weapon will slightly increase the distance that you can see.
intro.zh: 上面描繪著一隻健壯凝視者的裝飾品。將它裝飾在武器上，會稍微增加你的可視距離。

intro.en: Armor of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.
intro.zh: 桀驁金牛凱魯斯的鎧甲. 能減少技能和魔法的魔力消耗並且很適合鑲嵌裝飾.

intro.en: A simple tonic that cures one of petrification.
intro.zh: 就是個能治療石化的藥水。

intro.en: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的兜帽。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.en: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的頭盔。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.en: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的頭具。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.en: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的法袍。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.en: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的重鎧甲。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.en: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.
intro.zh: 全能鳳凰的崇拜者所穿的輕鎧甲。使用它有機會能暫時提升身體素質。

intro.zh: 散發著緋紅光芒的寶石。鑲嵌在武器上可使你在造成對手傷害的同時治療自己的創傷。

name.zh: 黑化的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 水晶化的刻耳柏洛斯之眼.鑲嵌在武器上能賦予額外的能力.

name.zh: 黑色的刻耳柏洛斯之眼

intro.en: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 水晶化的刻耳柏洛斯之眼.鑲嵌在武器上能賦予額外的能力.

intro.en: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.
intro.zh: 鑲嵌此天堂的裝飾品可以為裝備增加許多性能。

intro.en: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.
intro.zh: 刻耳柏洛斯代表性的法杖.

intro.en: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos.
intro.zh: 代表無情刻耳柏洛斯的強力之劍。

intro.en: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.
intro.zh: 用刻耳柏洛斯遺骸打造的耐用兜帽.穿上它能防止被冰凍.

intro.en: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.
intro.zh: 由刻耳柏洛斯那尖銳、強大、鋒利如刃的爪所製成。攻擊有機會造成流血及冰凍狀態。

intro.en: A small weapon carried by a Clurichaun. Although it is not suitable for your primary hand, it will fit as an obscure off-hand.
intro.zh: 酒精靈所持的小兵刃。雖然不太適合當主武使用，但可以當作隱藏的副手武。

intro.en: A small weapon carried by a Clurichaun. Although it is not suitable for your primary hand, it will fit as an obscure off-hand.

intro.zh: 酒精靈所持的小兵刃。雖然不太適合當主武使用，但可以當作隱藏的副手武。

intro.en: Belt of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It will slightly protect one from status effects while making it easier to apply status effects to your opponents.
intro.zh: 愛惡作劇的酒精靈納根因的腰帶。稍微防止你受到狀態異常的同時讓你更容易造成對手狀態異常。

intro.en: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.
intro.zh: 充滿魔物知識的巨著.能增加獲得的經驗值.

intro.en: Shield of Donta, once a great hero of the Order of the Unfelled. Donta had fallen in the battle of 992 DCE to Balor forces, leaving Mara indefinitely to search for her love.
intro.zh: 曾是不落者勢力中的偉大英雄，唐塔，所持有的盾。唐塔在DCE 992年與巴羅爾軍勢的戰役中墮落，從此離開瑪萊去尋找她的愛。

intro.en: A charm imbued with Seeker Mara's magic. It will both help you see farther while increasing the life and mana healed by potions.
intro.zh: 充滿探索者瑪萊魔力的護符。它能使你看得更遠並讓藥水恢復更多HP及MP。

intro.en: A luring charm made by Ceres to attract a certain powerful Fallen hero. Wearing it will attract additional monsters.
intro.zh: 柯瑞斯做來吸引強大墮落英雄的誘惑護符。戴上它能吸引更多的怪物。

intro.en: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.
intro.zh: 曾經固定在高貴的雕像上的匕首.有小機率使對手石化.

intro.en: A simple whistle useful for calling birds from trees.
intro.zh: 從樹叢中呼喚鳥兒出來的笛子。

intro.en: A scroll of destructive solar magic crafted by Emile. Using it will grant the skills "Solarstrikes" and "Solarseals".
intro.zh: 愛彌兒所製作含有太陽魔力的卷軸。使用它能得到技能"天照連擊"和"天照連閃"。

intro.en: A fine hammer used by Galar. Using this item before upgrading equipment at the blacksmith will reduce the time needed to complete the upgrades.
intro.zh: 伽勒爾所用的精良錘子。在鐵匠鋪升級裝備之前先使用它的話可以降低升級所需時間。

intro.en: A fine hammer used by the skilled smiths of Myrkheim. Using this item before upgrading equipment at the blacksmith will greatly reduce the time needed to complete the upgrades.
intro.zh: 米爾克海姆的老鐵匠使用的上好錘子。在鐵匠鋪升級裝備之前先使用它的話可以大幅降低升級所需時間。

intro.en: A simple piece of parchment given to you by Samson. Using this item will temporarily improve the gold, orns, and experience earned when completing quests.
intro.zh: 參孫給的一張紙。使用它能暫時提升完成任務時獲得的金幣、歐幣和經驗值。

intro.en: A candle gifted by Damra as part of the Steward ritual. Light it to summon your Steward.
intro.zh: 在眷族秘儀中丹姆萊所贈送的蠟燭。點亮它能召喚你的眷族。

intro.en: An oddly shaped crystal fallen from Olympia. Using it will allow one to return to another Realm without wait.
intro.zh: 在奧林匹亞偶爾能拾獲的水晶。使用它能讓你不需等待便能重返異域。

intro.en: A token allowing one to build a decoration in their area.
intro.zh: 可以為區域放上裝飾的代幣。

intro.en: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.
intro.zh: 香甜又營養的藥水。讓你的跟隨者喝下就能在一定時間內提升它們的行動機率。

intro.en: Lunar Catalyst of Rosa, fallen queen of the Enlightened.
intro.zh: 墮落啟蒙者之后羅莎的太陰觸媒。

intro.en: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.
intro.zh: 那遙遠記憶的一個片段。那被眾人所畏懼的告死天使的記憶。亞坡倫年輕之時不愛正統式的防守，他靈巧且充滿了活力。

intro.en: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

intro.en: A strange side-arm carried by Apollyon. Before being stolen and damaged by Morrigan, Apollyon imbued great elemental resistance in this piece.
intro.zh: 亞坡倫持有的奇特副手武器。在被摩莉甘盜走之前，亞坡倫將它附上了強力的元素抗性。

intro.en: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.
intro.zh: 那遙遠記憶的一個片段。那被眾人所畏懼的告死天使的記憶。亞坡倫年輕之時不愛正統式的防守，他靈巧且充滿了活力。

intro.en: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.
intro.zh: 亞坡倫的學生持有的一本書。亞坡倫在一頭栽進破滅魔法之前對精靈平衡元素的方式頗有一套。這些書就附有元素魔力。

intro.en: Lunar Catalyst of Verrick, fallen king of the Enlightened.
intro.zh: 墮落啟蒙者之王凡列克的太陰觸媒。

intro.en: A large garnet that symbolizes one's allegiance to the Order of the Unfelled. Wearing this gem will allow one to enter dungeons found in the world more frequently.
intro.zh: 象徵著一個人效忠於不落者勢力的巨大飾品。佩戴這顆寶石可以讓你更頻繁地進入在世界上發現的地城。

Bastion.intro: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

BastionII.intro: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

UpwardStrike.intro: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

BastionIII.intro: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

Parry.intro: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

Volley.intro: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

VolleyII.intro: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

Impale.intro: Attack with your weapon extended, dealing moderate damage but mitigating damage from your opponent's next attack.

WeaponEnvy.intro: Deals arcane damage and may cause curse.

UpwardStrikeII.intro: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

ManaBurn.intro: Converts half of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

ManaBurnII.intro: Converts most of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

WeaponCounterattack.intro: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

VolleyIII.intro: Deals damage thrice, grants 3 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

WeaponPoisonstrike.intro: Attack with a chance of causing poison.

LaySpikes.intro: Lay spikes around your opponent, potentially greatly increasing damage and the chance for a critical strike.

WeaponBrilliantLights.intro: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

WeaponLacuna.intro: Deals non-elemental magic damage and may suspend an enemy in time.

WeaponPommelStrike.intro: Strike an enemy with the hilt of a weapon, increasing the chance to stun.

WeaponHorizontalSlash.intro: Attack from the side, cutting an opponent's defenses and giving Ward for 1 turn.

WeaponArrowStorm.intro: Bombard your opponent with many arrows.

WeaponLacunus.intro: Deals non-elemental magic damage and may suspend an enemy in time.

WeaponAnthem.intro: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

RequiemIII.intro: Deals moderate non-elemental damage and may lull an opponent

WeaponCounterattackII.intro: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.
